4865.en:
<voice 00045_00004865><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>Hmm? You need Director Dura for something? Sorry,
but he's...<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4865.ja:
<voice 00045_00004865><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>「うん？　ドゥラ院長に　何か用か？
　だが　院長は……<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4865.ko:
<voice 00045_00004865><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>: 응? 두라 원장님께 볼일이라도 있어?
　하지만 원장님은……<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4865.zh-Hans:
<voice 00045_00004865><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>嗯？有事找杜拉院长吗？
可是，院长他……<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4865.zh-Hant:
<voice 00045_00004865><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>嗯？有事找杜拉院長嗎？
可是，院長他……<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4866.en: <voice 00195_00004866><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>Director Dura! You're leaving already?<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4866.ja:
<voice 00195_00004866><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>「ドゥラ院長！
　もう　お出かけですか？<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4866.ko:
<voice 00195_00004866><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>: 두라 원장님!
　벌써 나가시는 겁니까?<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4866.zh-Hans:
<voice 00195_00004866><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>杜拉院长！
要出门了吗？<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4866.zh-Hant:
<voice 00195_00004866><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>杜拉院長！
您要出門了嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5099.en:
<voice 00275_00005099><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Yes. I want King Woolard to see the results of my
research, so I can put his mind at ease.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5099.ja:
<voice 00275_00005099><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ああ。私の研究成果を見てもらい
　ウラード国王にも　早く
　安心していただきたいからね。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5099.ko:
<voice 00275_00005099><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그래, 내 연구 성과를 선보여
　한시라도 빨리 울라드 국왕 전하를
　안심시켜 드리고 싶으니까.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5099.zh-Hans:
<voice 00275_00005099><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>是啊，我想让乌拉德国王
看到我的研究成果，
让他能尽早安心。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5099.zh-Hant:
<voice 00275_00005099><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>是啊，我想請烏拉德國王
看看我的研究成果，
讓他能儘早安心。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4867.en: <voice 00325_00004867><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>And with that, I'm off.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4867.ja: <voice 00325_00004867><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「では　行ってくる。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4867.ko: <voice 00325_00004867><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그럼 다녀오지.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4867.zh-Hans: <voice 00325_00004867><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那么我走了。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4867.zh-Hant: <voice 00325_00004867><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那麼我走了。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5100.en: <voice 00455_00005100><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>Have a safe trip!<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5100.ja: <voice 00455_00005100><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>「いってらっしゃいませ！<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5100.zh-Hans: <voice 00455_00005100><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>路上小心！<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5100.zh-Hant: <voice 00455_00005100><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>路上小心！<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4869.en:
<voice 00515_00004869><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>To think he's the same age as Prince Ramiza, 16 years
old. What a brilliant, young man...<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4869.ja:
<voice 00515_00004869><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>「あれで　ラミザ王子と同じ　１６歳とは。
　まったく　たいした若者だ……。<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4869.ko:
<voice 00515_00004869><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>: 저런 분이 라미자 왕자님과 같은 16살이라니.
　정말 대단한 분이라니까…….<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4869.zh-Hans:
<voice 00515_00004869><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>谁能想到，他竟和拉米撒王子同样都是１６岁呢？
真是个了不起的年轻人啊。<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4869.zh-Hant:
<voice 00515_00004869><start_lip_sync n00399 _normal m00001>他那樣竟和拉米撒王子同樣都是１６歲。
真是個了不起的年輕人……<stop_lip_animation n00399 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4871.en:
<voice 00230_00004871><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>I've been waiting for you, Dura.
Is it true? Can you really restore
the shine of our fading Sun Stone?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4871.ja:
<voice 00230_00004871><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「待っておったぞ　ドゥラ。
　今にも失われそうな　太陽の石のかがやきを
　取り戻すことができるとは　本当なのか？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4871.ko:
<voice 00230_00004871><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 기다렸다, 두라.
　당장이라도 꺼질 것만 같은 태양의 돌의
　빛을 되살릴 수 있다는 것이 사실이냐?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4871.zh-Hans:
<voice 00230_00004871><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>等你很久了，杜拉。
能找回即将失去的
太阳之石的光辉，这是真的吗？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4871.zh-Hant:
<voice 00230_00004871><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>等你很久了，杜拉。
你說能恢復太陽石隨時都可能
失去的光輝，這是真的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4872.en: <voice 00335_00004872><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Yes, King Woolard. First, please look at this.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4872.ja:
<voice 00335_00004872><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「はい　ウラード国王。
　まずは　こちらを　ご覧ください。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4872.ko:
<voice 00335_00004872><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 예, 전하.
　우선 이걸 봐 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4872.zh-Hans:
<voice 00335_00004872><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>是的，乌拉德国王。
首先，请您看这边。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4872.zh-Hant:
<voice 00335_00004872><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>是的，烏拉德國王。
首先，請您看這邊。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4873.en: <voice 00500_00004873><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>No way... Is that a Sun Stone!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4873.ja: <voice 00500_00004873><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「それは……　まさか　太陽の石か！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4873.ko: <voice 00500_00004873><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그건…… 설마 태양의 돌인가!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4873.zh-Hans: <voice 00500_00004873><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>那……难道是太阳之石？！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4873.zh-Hant: <voice 00500_00004873><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>那個……難道是太陽石！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4874.en: <voice 00589_00004874><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Indeed, it is.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4874.ja: <voice 00589_00004874><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「さようでございます。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4875.en:
<voice 01099_00004875><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>How did you manage to find one!?
It's said to have been all
dug up and depleted decades ago!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4875.ja:
<voice 01099_00004875><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「どうやって　太陽の石を　手に入れたのじゃ！？
　数十年も前に　掘りつくされ
　枯渇したと言われる　幻の石なのじゃぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4875.ko:
<voice 01099_00004875><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 어떻게 태양의 돌을 손에 넣은 것이냐!?
　수십 년 전에 다 채굴되어
　고갈됐다고 전해지는 환상의 돌을!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4875.zh-Hans:
<voice 01099_00004875><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你是怎么拿到太阳之石的？！
这不正是听说几十年前
已经被挖光的梦幻之石吗！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4875.zh-Hant:
<voice 01099_00004875><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你是怎麼拿到太陽石的！？
這可是聽說在幾十年前
就被挖掘殆盡的夢幻之石啊！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4876.en: <voice 01204_00004876><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I created it myself, my King.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4876.ja: <voice 01204_00004876><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「創りだしたのでございます　国王。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4876.ko: <voice 01204_00004876><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 만들었습니다, 전하.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4876.zh-Hans: <voice 01204_00004876><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>这是我创造出来的，国王。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4876.zh-Hant: <voice 01204_00004876><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>這是我創造出來的，國王。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4877.en:
<voice 01320_00004877><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>You... Created it!?
How is that even possible...?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4877.ja:
<voice 01320_00004877><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「創った……じゃと！？
　そんなこと　できるはずが……。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4877.ko:
<voice 01320_00004877><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 만들었다고……!?
　그런 게 가능할 리가…….<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4877.zh-Hans:
<voice 01320_00004877><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你说……创造出来的？！
那应该不可能啊……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4877.zh-Hant:
<voice 01320_00004877><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你說……創造出來的！？
那應該不可能啊……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4878.en:
<voice 01376_00004878><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Now, I will show you how a Sun
Stone is actually created.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4878.ja:
<voice 01376_00004878><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「では　今から　実際に
　太陽の石を　創ってみせましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4878.ko:
<voice 01376_00004878><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그럼 지금 이 자리에서 실제로
　태양의 돌을 만들어 보죠.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4878.zh-Hans:
<voice 01376_00004878><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那么，我现在就直接
创造出太阳之石给您看看。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4878.zh-Hant:
<voice 01376_00004878><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那麼，我現在就直接
創造出太陽石給您看看。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4879.en: <voice 01590_00004879><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>That black stone is...!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4879.ja: <voice 01590_00004879><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「その黒い石は……！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4879.ko: <voice 01590_00004879><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그 검은 돌은……!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4879.zh-Hans: <voice 01590_00004879><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>那个黑色的石头是……？！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4879.zh-Hant: <voice 01590_00004879><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>那個黑色的石頭是……！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4880.en:
<voice 01700_00004880><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Yes. This lump of evil miasma is a
Miasmite. However, by placing it on the
Magicloth, you won't touch it directly.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4880.ja:
<voice 01700_00004880><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「はい。悪しき瘴気の塊　魔瘴石でございます。
　ですが　この魔法布の上に置き
　直接　触れねば　なんの心配もございません。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4880.ko:
<voice 01700_00004880><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 예, 사악한 독기의 결정체인 마장석입니다.
　하지만 이 마법포 위에 올려
　직접 만지지 않으면 아무 문제 없습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4880.zh-Hans:
<voice 01700_00004880><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>没错。这正是邪恶瘴气的聚合物，也就是魔瘴石。
但是，如果放在魔法布上，
不直接接触到人体的话，就不会有任何问题。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4880.zh-Hant:
<voice 01700_00004880><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>沒錯，這正是邪惡瘴氣的聚合物，也就是魔瘴石。
但是，如果放在魔法布上，
不要直接接觸到人體的話，就不會有任何問題。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4881.ko: <voice 01804_00004881><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그…… 그렇군.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4882.en: <voice 01894_00004882><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Now, l'll begin.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4882.ja: <voice 01894_00004882><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「では　始めます。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4882.ko: <voice 01894_00004882><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그럼 시작하겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4882.zh-Hans: <voice 01894_00004882><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那么，要开始了。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4882.zh-Hant: <voice 01894_00004882><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那麼，要開始了。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4883.en:
<voice 02360_00004883><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>U-unbelievable!
You're telling me that you turned
that Miasmite into a Sun Stone!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4883.ja:
<voice 02360_00004883><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「ま　まさか……！
　魔瘴石を　太陽の石に変えたというのか！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4883.ko:
<voice 02360_00004883><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 이, 이럴 수가……!
　마장석을 태양의 돌로 바꾼 건가!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4883.zh-Hans:
<voice 02360_00004883><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>不、不会吧……？
你竟然将魔瘴石变成了太阳之石？！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4883.zh-Hant:
<voice 02360_00004883><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>不、不會吧……？
你竟然將魔瘴石變成了太陽石！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4884.en:
<voice 02681_00004884><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>The Miasmite and Sun Stone... Although
their power is opposite of one another,
they are both indeed strong.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4884.ja:
<voice 02681_00004884><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「魔瘴石と　太陽の石……。
　陰と陽のちがいは　ありますが
　どちらも　強いチカラを秘めた石。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4884.ko:
<voice 02681_00004884><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 마장석과 태양의 돌…….
　음과 양의 차이는 있지만
　둘 다 강력한 힘을 지닌 돌이죠.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4884.zh-Hans:
<voice 02681_00004884><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>魔瘴石与太阳之石……
虽然分属阴、阳，
但两者都是蕴藏着强大力量的石头。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4884.zh-Hant:
<voice 02681_00004884><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>魔瘴石與太陽石……
雖然分屬陰、陽，
但兩者都是蘊藏著強大力量的石頭。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4885.en:
<voice 02776_00004885><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>After much research, I've come to the
conclusion that a Miasmite can become
a Sun Stone by reversing its power!!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4885.ja:
<voice 02776_00004885><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「私は　長い研究の末　たどりついたのです！
　魔瘴石は　チカラの向きを変えると
　太陽の石に　生まれ変わるという事実に！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4885.ko:
<voice 02776_00004885><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 전 오랜 연구 끝에 마침내 알아냈습니다!
　마장석은 힘의 방향만 바꿔 주면
　태양의 돌로 바뀐다는 사실을!!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4885.zh-Hans:
<voice 02776_00004885><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我经过长年累月的研究终于发现，
只要改变魔瘴石力量的方向，
就会使其变异成太阳之石！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4885.zh-Hant:
<voice 02776_00004885><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我經過長年累月的研究終於發現，
只要改變魔瘴石的力量方向，
就能使其重生為太陽石！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4886.ja: <voice 02846_00004886><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「すばらしい……！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4886.zh-Hans: <voice 02846_00004886><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>太厉害了……！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4886.zh-Hant: <voice 02846_00004886><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>太厲害了……！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4887.en:
<voice 02867_00004887><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Well done, Dura. Your passion has finally paid off,
hasn't it!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4887.ja:
<voice 02867_00004887><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「よくやった　ドゥラよ。
　そなたの情熱が　ついに　実を結んだのじゃな！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4887.ko:
<voice 02867_00004887><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 정말 잘했다, 두라.
　그대의 열정이 마침내 결실을 맺었군!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4887.zh-Hans:
<voice 02867_00004887><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>干得好，杜拉！
你这股热情终于开花结果了啊！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4887.zh-Hant:
<voice 02867_00004887><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>幹得好，杜拉！
你這股熱情終於開花結果了啊！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4888.en:
<voice 02902_00004888><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I'm honored to hear you say that.
However, we cannot rest easy just yet.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4888.ja:
<voice 02902_00004888><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「おほめにあずかり　光栄でございます。
　しかし　まだ　安心はできません。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4888.ko:
<voice 02902_00004888><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그리 칭찬해 주시니 몸 둘 바를 모르겠군요.
　하지만 아직 안심하기는 이릅니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4888.zh-Hans:
<voice 02902_00004888><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>能受到您的称赞，我十分光荣。
不过，现在还不能放心。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4888.zh-Hant:
<voice 02902_00004888><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>能受到您的稱讚，我感到十分光榮。
不過，現在還不能放心。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4889.en:
<voice 02973_00004889><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>We need many Miasmites to
restore the Sun Stone's glow to its
former glory!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4889.ja:
<voice 02973_00004889><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「この国を支える　頭上の太陽の石が
　太古のかがやきを　取り戻すためには
　多くの魔瘴石が　必要なのです！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4889.ko:
<voice 02973_00004889><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 우리 나라의 근간인 태양의 돌이
　태고의 빛을 되찾으려면
　대량의 마장석이 필요합니다!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4889.zh-Hans:
<voice 02973_00004889><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>为了让头上这颗支撑整个国家的太阳之石
重新绽放太古的光芒，
我们需要大量的魔瘴石！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4889.zh-Hant:
<voice 02973_00004889><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>為了讓頭上支撐整個國家的太陽石
重新散發太古的光輝，
我們需要大量的魔瘴石！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4890.en:
<voice 03066_00004890><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Understood.
Now, I shall have you collect more
Miasmites right away!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4890.ja:
<voice 03066_00004890><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「なるほど。
　では　さっそく　魔瘴石を集めさせよう！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4890.ko:
<voice 03066_00004890><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그렇군.
　그렇다면 바로 마장석을 모으라 명하겠다!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4890.zh-Hans:
<voice 03066_00004890><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>原来如此。
那么我们就立刻开始收集魔瘴石吧！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4890.zh-Hant:
<voice 03066_00004890><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>原來如此。
那麼我們就立刻開始收集魔瘴石吧！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4891.en:
<voice 03156_00004891><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>You heard what he said!
Those who bring lots of Miasmites
here will be rewarded most accordingly!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4891.ja:
<voice 03156_00004891><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「聞いた通りだ　皆の者！
　これより　魔瘴石を集めてきた者には
　その量に応じて　ほうびを与える！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4891.ko:
<voice 03156_00004891><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 모두, 방금 들은 대로다!
　지금부터 마장석을 모아 온 자에게는
　그 양에 따라 포상을 내리겠다!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4891.zh-Hans:
<voice 03156_00004891><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>各位都听好了！
即刻起，搜集到多少魔瘴石
就能获得多少奖励！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4891.zh-Hant:
<voice 03156_00004891><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>各位都聽好了！
即刻起，你蒐集到多少魔瘴石
就能獲得多少獎勵！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4892.en:
<voice 03336_00004892><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>The Miasmites are most abundant in
the Calsadora Volcano to the east. Please
follow the instructions of the researcher on site.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4892.ja:
<voice 03336_00004892><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「魔瘴石は　この国の東にある
　カルサドラ火山で　多く採れます。
　現地にいる　研究員の指示に従ってください。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4892.ko:
<voice 03336_00004892><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 마장석은 우리 나라 동쪽에 있는
　칼사드라 화산에서 많이 채굴됩니다.
　현지에 있는 연구원의 지시에 따라 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4892.zh-Hans:
<voice 03336_00004892><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>在我国东边的卡尔萨多拉火山
可以采集到更多的魔瘴石。
请遵照当地研究员的指示进行作业。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4892.zh-Hant:
<voice 03336_00004892><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>在我國東邊的卡爾薩朵拉火山
可以採集到更多的魔瘴石。
請遵照當地研究員的指示進行作業。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4893.en: <voice 03506_00004893><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>The one who will save Dolworm... Is me!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4893.ja: <voice 03506_00004893><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ドルワームを救うのは……　この私だ！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4893.ko: <voice 03506_00004893><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 도르웜을 구하는 사람은…… 바로 나야!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4893.zh-Hans: <voice 03506_00004893><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>拯救多尔瓦姆的……将会是我！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4893.zh-Hant: <voice 03506_00004893><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>拯救多爾瓦姆的……將會是我！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4894.en:
<voice 04281_00004894><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>If I collect a bunch of those
Miasmites, I'll get a bunch of attention
too. This could be good...<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4894.ja:
<voice 04281_00004894><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「魔瘴石ってヤツを　大量に集めてきたら
　それだけ　注目を浴びるってワケね。
　これは　使えるかも……。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4894.ko:
<voice 04281_00004894><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 마장석이란 걸 잔뜩 모아 오면
　그만큼 주목받을 수 있단 거지?
　이거 괜찮겠는데……?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4894.zh-Hans:
<voice 04281_00004894><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>大量收集魔瘴石这玩意，
肯定就能受到瞩目了。
那这招可能行得通……<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4894.zh-Hant:
<voice 04281_00004894><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>所以要是能蒐集到大量的魔瘴石，
可以備受矚目就對了。
那這招可能行得通……<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4895.en:
<voice 04558_00004895><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Hey, wait a minute... Aren't you
my former servant, <pc>!?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4895.ja:
<voice 04558_00004895><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「あら　あなたは　たしか……。
　あたしの元下僕の　<pc>じゃないッ！？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4895.ko:
<voice 04558_00004895><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 어머, 넌…….
　내 부하였던 {pc}|hpp(이잖아,잖아)!?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4895.zh-Hans:
<voice 04558_00004895><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>咦，记得你好像是……
我的前一任仆人<pc>吧？！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4895.zh-Hant:
<voice 04558_00004895><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>咦，記得你好像是……
我的前一任僕人<pc>吧！？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4896.en:
<voice 04648_00004896><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Hehehe... What a good timing for you!
You have the honor of becoming
my servant again!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4896.ja:
<voice 04648_00004896><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「くくく……　いいところで　会ったわね！
　タイミングのよさに免じて
　もう一度　あたしの下僕にしてあげるわッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4896.ko:
<voice 04648_00004896><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 후후후…… 마침 잘 만났어!
　이 기막힌 타이밍에 나타난 걸 봐서
　널 다시 내 부하로 삼아 줄게!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4896.zh-Hans:
<voice 04648_00004896><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……我们还相遇得真是时候啊！
看在这个好时机上，
我就允许你再次成为我的仆人！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4896.zh-Hant:
<voice 04648_00004896><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……我們還相遇得真是時候啊！
看在這個好時機上，
我就允許你再次成為我的僕人！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001547.en:
<voice 04693_00028452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>I had a bad time at Agrani, but I'm
going to make my mark here at
Dorworm and this time I'm going to make my name known all over
the world!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001547.ja:
<voice 04693_00028452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「アグラニでは　散々な目にあったけど
　このドルワームで活躍をして　今度こそ
　あたしの名を　世界中に　とどろかせるのよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001547.ko:
<voice 04693_00028452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 아그라니에서는 실패했지만
　이 도르웜에서 활약해 이번에야말로
　내 이름을 전 세계에 알리겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001547.zh-Hans:
<voice 04693_00028452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>在阿古拉尼时，虽然碰了钉子，
但这次一定不会再出差错了。我要在多尔瓦姆
这座舞台上一展身手，令世界为之倾倒！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001547.zh-Hant:
<voice 04693_00028452><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>在阿古拉尼時，雖然碰了釘子，
但這次一定不會再出差錯了。我要在多爾瓦姆
這座舞台上一展身手，令世界為之傾倒！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4897.en:
<voice 04558_00004897><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Hey, you there...
You've got sharp eyes, don't you?
Your name's... <pc>. Gotcha.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4897.ja:
<voice 04558_00004897><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「あら　あなた……。
　なかなか　いい目をしてるじゃないッ！？
　名前は……　そう　<pc>っていうの。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4897.ko:
<voice 04558_00004897><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 어머, 너…….
　제법 눈이 똘망똘망한걸!?
　이름은…… 그래, {pc}|hpp(이란,란) 말이지?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4897.zh-Hans:
<voice 04558_00004897><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>哎呀，你……
你这眼神很不错嘛？！
你的名字是……这样啊，你叫<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4897.zh-Hant:
<voice 04558_00004897><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>哎呀，你……
眼神還挺不錯的嘛！？
名字是……喔，是叫<pc>啊。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4898.en:
<voice 04648_00004898><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>I love it! Just when I was in need of
some old fashioned manpower...
you can be a servant for me, the amazing Lunana!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4898.ja:
<voice 04648_00004898><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ふふん　気に入ったわ！
　ちょうど　人手のほしいところだったし
　あなた　このルナナさまの下僕になりなさいッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4898.ko:
<voice 04648_00004898><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 후훗, 마음에 들었어!
　마침 일손이 필요하던 참이었으니
　너, 이 루나나 님의 부하가 되도록 해!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4898.zh-Hans:
<voice 04648_00004898><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，我喜欢！
我正好需要有人来帮我，
你就来当我露娜娜的仆人吧！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4898.zh-Hant:
<voice 04648_00004898><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>呵呵呵，我喜歡！
我正好需要有人來幫我，
你就來當我露娜娜的僕人吧！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001548.en:
<voice 04693_00028453><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>I will become notoriously famous worldwide from the
exposure I get at Dolworm!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001548.ja:
<voice 04693_00028453><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「あたしの夢は　世界一の名声を手に入れること！
　このドルワームで　活躍をして
　あたしの名を　世界中に　とどろかせるのよッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001548.ko:
<voice 04693_00028453><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 내 꿈은 세상에서 가장 유명해지는 거야!
　이 도르웜에서 활약해
　내 이름을 전 세계에 알리겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001548.zh-Hans:
<voice 04693_00028453><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我的梦想是成为这世界上家喻户晓的人物！
而我在多尔瓦姆这座舞台上的表现
将会令世人倾倒！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001548.zh-Hant:
<voice 04693_00028453><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我的夢想是成為這世界上家喻戶曉的人物！
我要在多爾瓦姆
這座舞台上一展身手，令世界為之傾倒！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000603.en:
<voice 04733_19000603><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Right. So your first order is to
accompany me east, across the
desert, to Calzadora Volcano!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000603.ja:
<voice 04733_19000603><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「それじゃあ　さっそく　命令するわ！
　あなたは　今すぐ　あたしの下僕として
　東のカルサドラ火山へ　同行するのよ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000603.ko:
<voice 04733_19000603><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 그럼 바로 명령을 내려 주지!
　넌 지금 당장 내 부하가 되어서
　동쪽의 칼사드라 화산까지 동행한다!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000603.zh-Hans:
<voice 04733_19000603><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我现在命令你！
作为我的仆人，立刻和我一起前往
东边的卡尔萨多拉火山！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000603.zh-Hant:
<voice 04733_19000603><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>我現在命令你！
作為我的僕人，立刻和我一起前往
東邊的卡爾薩朵拉火山！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000604.en:
<voice 04783_19000604><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>What for, you ask? To obtain a massive
supply of Miasmite, of course! Now get
going before I have to start getting bossy!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000604.ja:
<voice 04783_19000604><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「何をしに　ですって？　決まってるじゃない。
　大量の魔瘴石を　ゲットしてくるのよッ！！
　命令に背いたら　痛い目を見るからね！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000604.ko:
<voice 04783_19000604><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 뭘 하러 가냐니? 당연한 걸 왜 물어?
　대량의 마장석을 가져오는 거지!!
　명령을 어기면 따끔한 맛을 볼 줄 알아!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000604.zh-Hans:
<voice 04783_19000604><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>去那里做什么？那还用说吗？
当然是去弄一大堆魔瘴石回来啊！！
敢违背命令，小心有你好看的！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000604.zh-Hant:
<voice 04783_19000604><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>去那裡做什麼？那還用說嗎？
當然是去弄一大堆魔瘴石回來啊！！
敢違背命令，小心有你好看的！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000605.en: Lunana has, forcibly, joined the party!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000605.ja:
ルナナが
むりやり　パーティに加わった。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000605.ko:
루나나가
억지로 파티에 합류했다.<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000605.zh-Hans:
露娜娜
硬是加入了队伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000605.zh-Hant:
露娜娜
硬是加入了隊伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>

4900.en: <voice 00090_00004900><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>You are a traveler, right.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4900.ja: <voice 00090_00004900><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「そなた　旅の者じゃな。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4900.ko: <voice 00090_00004900><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그대는 여행자로군.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4900.zh-Hans: <voice 00090_00004900><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你是旅行者吧。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4900.zh-Hant: <voice 00090_00004900><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你是旅人吧。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4901.en:
<voice 00140_00004901><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>In our country, we have decided to
give a reward to those who have
collected the Miasmite.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4901.ja:
<voice 00140_00004901><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「我が国では　魔瘴石を集めてきた者に
　ほうびを　与えることにした。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4901.ko:
<voice 00140_00004901><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 우리 나라에서는 마장석을 모아 온 자에게
　포상을 내리기로 했네.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4901.zh-Hans:
<voice 00140_00004901><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我国会给予魔瘴石的搜集者
丰厚的奖励。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4901.zh-Hant:
<voice 00140_00004901><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我國會給予魔瘴石的蒐集者
豐厚的獎勵。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4902.en:
<voice 00170_00004902><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>If you are confident in your skills, head
to the Calzadora volcano in the east of
this country and get the Miasmite.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4902.ja:
<voice 00170_00004902><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「ウデに　自信があるのなら
　この国の東にある　カルサドラ火山へ向かい
　魔瘴石を　手に入れてくるがよい。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4902.ko:
<voice 00170_00004902><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 실력에 자신이 있다면
　우리 나라 동쪽에 있는 칼사드라 화산으로 가
　마장석을 구해 오도록.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4902.zh-Hans:
<voice 00170_00004902><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>要是对自己的实力有信心的话，
就到这个国家东边的卡尔萨多拉火山，
去为我们搜集魔瘴石回来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4902.zh-Hant:
<voice 00170_00004902><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>要是對自己的實力有信心的話，
就到為在這座國家東邊的卡爾薩朵拉火山，
去為我們蒐集魔瘴石回來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4903.ja: <voice 00040_00004903><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「ラミザ王子！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4903.ko: <voice 00040_00004903><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 라미자 왕자님!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4903.zh-Hans: <voice 00040_00004903><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拉米撒王子！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4903.zh-Hant: <voice 00040_00004903><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拉米撒王子！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4905.en:
<voice 00210_00004905><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Dura was amazing, wasn't he? Even Father looked so
happy...<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4905.ja:
<voice 00210_00004905><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ドゥラくん　すごかったよねえ。
　父上も　あんなに　よろこんでさ……。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4905.ko:
<voice 00210_00004905><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 두라, 정말 굉장하더라.
　아바마마도 그렇게 기뻐하시고…….<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4905.zh-Hans:
<voice 00210_00004905><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>杜拉真是太厉害了，
你看父王高兴成那样……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4905.zh-Hant:
<voice 00210_00004905><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>杜拉真是太厲害了，
你看父王高興成那樣……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4906.en:
<voice 00240_00004906><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>W-why can't I be good enough...?
I've been doing my best to make
up for my missing sibling...<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4906.ja:
<voice 00240_00004906><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ど　どうして　ボクは　ダメなのかな。
　ボクは　捨てられた兄弟の分まで
　がんばらないと　いけないのに……。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4906.ko:
<voice 00240_00004906><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 나, 나는 왜 이 모양인 걸까.
　버림받은 동생 몫까지
　내가 더 잘해야 하는데…….<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4906.zh-Hans:
<voice 00240_00004906><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>为、为什么我就那么没用呢？
我明明要代替
我那被抛弃的手足加倍努力的……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4906.zh-Hant:
<voice 00240_00004906><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>為、為什麼我怎麼就那麼沒用呢？
我明明要代替
我那被拋棄的手足加倍努力的……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4907.ja: <voice 00290_00004907><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「ラミザ王子……。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4907.ko: <voice 00290_00004907><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 라미자 왕자님…….<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4907.zh-Hans: <voice 00290_00004907><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拉米撒王子……<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4907.zh-Hant: <voice 00290_00004907><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拉米撒王子……<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4908.en: <voice 00130_00004908><start_lip_sync n00401 _normal m00001>Wooow, we sure dug up a lot!<stop_lip_animation n00401 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4908.ja: <voice 00130_00004908><start_lip_sync n00401 _normal m00001>「いやあ～　たんまり　掘ったなあ！<stop_lip_animation n00401 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4908.ko: <voice 00130_00004908><start_lip_sync n00401 _normal m00001>: 이야~ 아주 두둑하게 캤는걸!<stop_lip_animation n00401 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4908.zh-Hans: <voice 00130_00004908><start_lip_sync n00401 _normal m00001>呀～挖到好多啊！<stop_lip_animation n00401 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4908.zh-Hant: <voice 00130_00004908><start_lip_sync n00401 _normal m00001>呀～挖到好多啊！<stop_lip_animation n00401 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4909.en:
<voice 00200_00004909><start_lip_sync n00402 _normal m00001>I wonder how much we'll be
rewarded for it... Gahahahahah! It's
making me all giddy!<stop_lip_animation n00402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4909.ja:
<voice 00200_00004909><start_lip_sync n00402 _normal m00001>「これだけありゃ　いったい
　どれくらい　ほうびが　もらえるのか……。
　ダハハハハッ　笑いが止まらねえ！！<stop_lip_animation n00402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4909.ko:
<voice 00200_00004909><start_lip_sync n00402 _normal m00001>: 이 정도면 대체
　얼마나 많은 포상을 받을지…….
　으하하하하, 웃음이 멈추질 않는군!!<stop_lip_animation n00402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4909.zh-Hans:
<voice 00200_00004909><start_lip_sync n00402 _normal m00001>搜集到这么多，
都不知道能拿到多少奖赏呢……
哈哈哈哈哈，我真是做梦也会笑！！<stop_lip_animation n00402 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4909.zh-Hant:
<voice 00200_00004909><start_lip_sync n00402 _normal m00001>蒐集到這麼多，
都不知道能拿到多少獎賞呢……
哈哈哈哈哈，我真是作夢也會笑！！<stop_lip_animation n00402 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4910.en: <voice 00630_00004910><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>Are you here to dig for Miasmites too?<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4910.ja:
<voice 00630_00004910><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>「あなたも　魔瘴石を
　掘りにいらっしゃったんですか？<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4910.ko:
<voice 00630_00004910><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>: 그쪽도 마장석을
　캐러 오신 겁니까?<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4910.zh-Hans:
<voice 00630_00004910><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>你也是来
挖魔瘴石的吗？<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4910.zh-Hant:
<voice 00630_00004910><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>你也是來
挖魔瘴石的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000606.en:
<voice 00680_19000606><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Don't do this to me! You're
proving to be useless as a servant..
I'm already so far behind!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000606.ja:
<voice 00680_19000606><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ンもう　<pc>！　使えない下僕ね！
　もうこんなに　先をこされてるじゃない！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000606.ko:
<voice 00680_19000606><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 아, <pc>! 쓸모없는 부하 같으니!
　벌써 이렇게나 선수를 빼앗겼잖아!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000606.zh-Hans:
<voice 00680_19000606><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>真是的，<pc>！你这仆人真没用！
都已经被超前这么多了！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000606.zh-Hant:
<voice 00680_19000606><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>真是的，<pc>！你這僕人很沒用耶！
都已經被超前這麼多了！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4912.en:
<voice 00870_00004912><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Hmm... So this is the place where
you can dig up Miasmites?<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4912.ja:
<voice 00870_00004912><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ふ～ん……　ここね？
　魔瘴石が採れるっていう　洞くつは。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4912.ko:
<voice 00870_00004912><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 흐음…… 여기구나?
　마장석이 나온다는 동굴이.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4912.zh-Hans:
<voice 00870_00004912><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>嗯……就是这里吧？
这里就是可以采集到魔瘴石的洞窟吧。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4912.zh-Hant:
<voice 00870_00004912><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>嗯……就是這裡吧？
這裡就是可以採集到魔瘴石的洞窟吧。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4913.en:
<voice 00925_00004913><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>...Y-yes. But many have been dug up
since long ago, so you'll have to
go quite deep to find any.<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4913.ja:
<voice 00925_00004913><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>「……は　はい。
　でも　ずいぶん　掘られてしまった後ですし
　かなり奥まで行かないと　採れないかと。<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4913.ko:
<voice 00925_00004913><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>: ……그, 그렇습니다.
　하지만 이미 많이 채굴됐으니
　꽤 깊은 곳까지 들어가야 나올 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4913.zh-Hans:
<voice 00925_00004913><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>……是、是的。
不过，这里已经让大家挖得差不多了，
所以想挖到的话，就得往更里面走才行。<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4913.zh-Hant:
<voice 00925_00004913><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>……是、是的。
不過，這裡已經挖得差不多了，
所以想挖到的話，就得往更裡面走才行。<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4914.en:
<voice 00975_00004914><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Heh heh, no problem!
I'll dig up the biggest Miasmite
you've ever seen!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4914.ja:
<voice 00975_00004914><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ふふん　上等よッ！
　誰も見たことがないくらい　デカイ魔瘴石を
　掘りだしてみせるわ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4914.ko:
<voice 00975_00004914><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 후후, 바라는 바야!
　아무도 본 적 없는 거대한 마장석을
　캐내고 말겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4914.zh-Hans:
<voice 00975_00004914><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>哼哼，那正好！
就等着看我挖出没人见过的
巨大魔瘴石吧！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4914.zh-Hant:
<voice 00975_00004914><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>哼哼，那正好！
就等著看我挖出沒人見過的
巨大魔瘴石吧！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4916.en:
<voice 01025_00004916><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>V-very good.
Now please, take this cloth with you.<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4916.ja:
<voice 01025_00004916><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>「わ　わかりました。それでは　皆さん
　この布を　お受け取りください。<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4916.ko:
<voice 01025_00004916><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>: 아, 알겠습니다.
　그럼 여러분, 이 천을 받으세요.<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4916.zh-Hans:
<voice 01025_00004916><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>我、我知道了。那么，各位
请过来拿这块布。<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4916.zh-Hant:
<voice 01025_00004916><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>我、我知道了。那麼，各位
請過來拿這塊布。<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001516.ja:
<pc>は
魔法布（だいじなもの）を　受け取った！<me 60>
19001516.zh-Hans:
<pc>收下了
魔法布（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001516.zh-Hant:
<pc>收下了
魔法布（重要物品）！<me 60>

5102.en:
<voice 01110_00005102><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>It's a magical cloth designed by
the Royal Research Institute. It's
dangerous to touch Miasmites directly, so please use the cloth.<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5102.ja:
<voice 01110_00005102><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>「それは　王立研究院で開発された　魔法布です。
　魔瘴石に　直接　触れるのは危険ですから
　必ず　その布ごしに　持ってください。<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5102.ko:
<voice 01110_00005102><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>: 그건 왕립 연구원에서 개발한 마법포입니다.
　마장석은 직접 만지면 위험하니
　꼭 그 천에 감싸서 옮기세요.<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5102.zh-Hans:
<voice 01110_00005102><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>那是王立研究院发明的魔法布。
直接触碰魔瘴石很危险，
所以请一定要隔着魔法布拿。<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5102.zh-Hant:
<voice 01110_00005102><start_lip_sync n00400 _normal m00001>那是王立研究院發明的魔法布。
直接碰觸魔瘴石很危險，
所以請一定要隔著魔法布拿。<stop_lip_animation n00400 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5103.en:
<voice 01200_00005103><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Heheh. Come on, <pc>.
Let's go deeper!
I'll show you just how lucky I can be!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5103.ja:
<voice 01200_00005103><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ふふん。さあ　奥へ行くわよ　<pc>！
　このルナナさまの　神がかった運のよさを
　見せつけてあげるわッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5103.ko:
<voice 01200_00005103><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 후훗. 안으로 들어가자, <pc>!
　이 루나나 님의 환상적인 운발을
　보여 주겠어!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5103.zh-Hans:
<voice 01200_00005103><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>呵呵。好，要进去啰，<pc>！
就让你见识露娜娜大人我这
有如神助般的好运吧！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5103.zh-Hant:
<voice 01200_00005103><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>呵呵。好，要進去裡面囉，<pc>！
就讓你見識露娜娜大人我這
有如神助般的好運吧！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4921.en:
<voice 00242_00004921><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Hehehe... I'm sure we can find a
gigantic Miasmite here. It doesn't look
like anyone has dug around here yet.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4921.ja:
<voice 00242_00004921><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「ふっふっふ……。
　この辺りは　まだ誰も　掘ってないみたいだし
　デカイ魔瘴石が　期待できそうね。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4921.ko:
<voice 00242_00004921><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 후후후…….
　이 주변은 아직 아무도 안 판 것 같으니
　거대한 마장석을 기대해 볼 만하겠어.<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4921.zh-Hans:
<voice 00242_00004921><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……
这一带好像还没被人开采过，
感觉可以挖出大块的魔瘴石。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4921.zh-Hant:
<voice 00242_00004921><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……
這一帶好像還沒被人開採過，
感覺可以挖出大塊的魔瘴石耶。<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28449.en:
<voice 00287_00028449><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Okay, Mutch and Butch!
Make it snappy.
Get digging already!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28449.ja:
<voice 00287_00028449><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「さあ　ムチェ　ブチャ！
　あなたたちの出番よ。
　さっさと　掘ってちょうだいッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28449.ko:
<voice 00287_00028449><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 무체, 부차!
　너희가 나설 차례야.
　어서 파도록 해!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28449.zh-Hans:

4942.en:
<voice 00100_00004942><start_lip_sync n00403 _normal m00001>Lalala, a tale from long, long ago...～♪
Royal twins, fight for the throne...
The country's fate is but unknown...<stop_lip_animation n00403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00100_00004942><start_lip_sync n00403 _normal m00001>「ラララ　遠い昔の物語～♪
　王家に生まれた　双子の子～。
　王位を争い　国を滅ぼす～。<stop_lip_animation n00403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4942.ko:
<voice 00100_00004942><start_lip_sync n00403 _normal m00001>: 라라라 먼 옛날의 이야기~♪

　왕위를 다투고 나라를 멸하리라~<stop_lip_animation n00403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4942.zh-Hans:
<voice 00100_00004942><start_lip_sync n00403 _normal m00001>啦啦啦，在那遥远的过去～♪
皇室诞生了一对双胞胎～
他们争夺王位，毁掉国家～<stop_lip_animation n00403 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4942.zh-Hant:
<voice 00100_00004942><start_lip_sync n00403 _normal m00001>啦啦啦，在那遙遠的過去～♪
皇室誕生了一對雙胞胎～

<voice 00200_00004944><start_lip_sync n00403 _normal m00001>Even so, sweet, sweet child...

4944.zh-Hans:
<voice 00200_00004944><start_lip_sync n00403 _normal m00001>即便如此，我可爱的孩子啊，

<voice 00260_00004945><start_lip_sync n00403 _normal m00001>To choose your country, or your child...

On this starry night, may we rejoice...<stop_lip_animation n00403 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 00260_00004945><start_lip_sync n00403 _normal m00001>国家和孩子，我该如何选择？

<voice 00000_00004946><start_lip_sync n00404 _normal m00001>Mmmmm! You have Miasmite, don't you? I will take that

<voice 00961_00004956><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>Hey, you! You're from the Royal

4957.zh-Hans:

4957.zh-Hant:
<voice 01011_00004957><start_lip_sync n00404 _normal m00001>好、好的！
請稍等！！<stop_lip_animation n00404 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01253_00004959><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>I'm tired of walking at a snail's pace

<voice 01253_00004959><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「こっちは　この魔瘴石のせいで

4959.ko:
<voice 01253_00004959><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 난 이 마장석 때문에

4959.zh-Hans:
<voice 01253_00004959><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>为了搬这块魔瘴石，我们费了好大的劲，

4959.zh-Hant:

4960.en: <voice 01433_00004960><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>What a stunning Miasmite this is...!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4960.ko: <voice 01433_00004960><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 정말 거대한 마장석이군……!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4960.zh-Hans: <voice 01433_00004960><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>真是完美的魔瘴石……！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4960.zh-Hant: <voice 01433_00004960><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>真是完美的魔瘴石……！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4961.en:
<voice 01483_00004961><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Brilliant!! With this Miasmite alone, Dolworm will
be safe forever!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4961.ja:
<voice 01483_00004961><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「すばらしい！！

4961.ko:
<voice 01483_00004961><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 굉장해!!

4961.zh-Hans:
<voice 01483_00004961><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>真是太棒了！！
有了这么大的魔瘴石，
多尔瓦姆将永远国泰民安了！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4961.zh-Hant:
<voice 01483_00004961><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>真是太棒了！！
有了這麼大的魔瘴石，
多爾瓦姆將永遠國泰民安了！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4962.en:
<voice 01570_00004962><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Okay, take this to the throne room!
I'll quickly change it into a Sun Stone.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4962.ja:
<voice 01570_00004962><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「さあ　この魔瘴石を　玉座の間へ！

4962.ko:
<voice 01570_00004962><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 어서 이 마장석을 옥좌의 방으로 옮겨!

4962.zh-Hans:
<voice 01570_00004962><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>来，把这块魔瘴石搬到王座大厅去！
我要马上把它变成太阳之石。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4962.zh-Hant:
<voice 01570_00004962><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>來，把這塊魔瘴石搬到王座之間！
我立刻將它變成太陽石。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4963.en:
<voice 01763_00004963><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I really can't thank you enough. Because of you, my

4963.ja:
<voice 01763_00004963><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「本当に　ありがとう。

4963.ko:
<voice 01763_00004963><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 정말 감사합니다.
　여러분 덕분에 제 꿈이 이뤄질 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4963.zh-Hans:
<voice 01763_00004963><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>真的是谢谢你们。
多亏有你们，我的梦想终于可以实现了。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4963.zh-Hant:
<voice 01763_00004963><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>真的是謝謝你們。
多虧有你們，我的夢想終於可以實現了。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4964.en:
<voice 01822_00004964><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Please come with me!
I'll advise the King to present you all
with Key Emblems for your efforts!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4964.ja:
<voice 01822_00004964><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「さあ　私と　一緒に来てください！
　皆さんに　キーエンブレムが贈られるよう
　私から　国王に進言しましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4964.ko:
<voice 01822_00004964><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 자, 저와 함께 가시죠!
　여러분에게 키 엠블럼이 하사될 수 있도록
　제가 전하께 잘 말씀드리겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4964.zh-Hans:
<voice 01822_00004964><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>好了，请和我一起来吧！
我会向国王陛下提出建议，
请他将键徽送给你们。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4964.zh-Hant:
<voice 01822_00004964><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>好了，請和我一起來吧！
我會向國王陛下提出建議，
請他將鑰徽送給你們。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4965.ja: <voice 01979_00004965><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「キーエンブレムですって……？<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01657_00004969><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>这块巨大的魔瘴石，

4970.en:
<voice 01781_00004970><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>If it's converted and purified into a
Sun Stone, the sun of Dolworm
will never lose its glow ever again.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01781_00004970><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「これを　太陽の石に変えて　補充すれば

　かがやきを　失うことはないでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4970.ko:
<voice 01781_00004970><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 이걸 태양의 돌로 바꿔 보충하면
　도르웜의 태양은
　영원히 빛을 잃지 않을 테죠.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4970.zh-Hans:
<voice 01781_00004970><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>若将它转化为太阳之石并补充进去，
多尔瓦姆的太阳就永远不会失去
耀眼的光芒吧。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4970.zh-Hant:
<voice 01781_00004970><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>只要將其轉化為太陽石並用來補充，
多爾瓦姆的太陽就能
永遠散發著耀眼的光輝吧。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4971.en:
<voice 01990_00004971><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Finally! The results of my research

<voice 01990_00004971><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「そう！　私の研究の成果で

4971.ko:
<voice 01990_00004971><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 그렇습니다! 제 연구 성과가
　도르웜을 구원할 겁니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4971.zh-Hans:
<voice 01990_00004971><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>没错！我的研究成果

4971.zh-Hant:

拯救了多爾瓦姆！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 03308_00004975><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>I MUST THANK YOU, DURA. NOW I CAN ONCE AGAIN ROAM THIS

4978.en:

　太陽の石ヲ作るために　魔瘴石ノ利用を

<voice 03664_00004979><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……

4980.zh-Hans:
<voice 03788_00004980><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>难、难道那是……

<voice 03842_00004981><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>...CORRECT. I USED YOU FOR

4982.en:
MY SOUL LIE TRAPPED INSIDE THAT STONE... I PATIENTLY AWAITED FOR ITS SEAL TO BE

4985.en:
<voice 04139_00004985><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>MY SOUL HAS BEEN RESTORED,

BODY. THEN I WILL BE FREE!<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 04139_00004985><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>「魂ガ　よみがえった　今

4986.ja: <voice 04292_00004986><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>「な　なによッ！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4986.ko: <voice 04292_00004986><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 뭐야!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4986.zh-Hant: <voice 04292_00004986><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>什、什麼嘛！<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 04379_00004987><start_lip_sync n00329 _normal m00001>I had no idea that thing was buried there!
It's not my fault!!<stop_lip_animation n00329 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4989.en:
<voice 04583_00004989><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>My goodness... That monster of legend
Kukulkannibal once tried to destroy this
country, and now has returned...<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4989.ja:
<voice 04583_00004989><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「なんということじゃ……。
　かつて　この国を滅ぼそうとした　伝説の魔物
　天魔クァバルナが　復活してしまうとは……。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 04583_00004989><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 이게 무슨 일이란 말인가…….
　오래전 이 나라를 멸망의 위기에 빠뜨린
　전설의 마물 천마 콰바르나가 부활하다니…….<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

那个传说中，曾试图毁灭国家的怪物

<voice 04583_00004989><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>怎麼會有這種事……
那個傳說中，曾試圖毀滅國家的怪物
天魔夸亞巴爾納竟然復活了……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28448.en:
<voice 04623_00028448><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Is what Kukulkannibal said true, Dura?
You heeded his wisdom to create the
Sun Stone?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28448.ja:
<voice 04623_00028448><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「ドゥラよ　クァバルナの言ったことは　本当か？
　あろうことか　ヤツの知恵を借り
　太陽の石を　創ってしまったというのか？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28448.ko:
<voice 04623_00028448><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 두라여, 콰바르나의 말이 사실인가?
　정말로 그자의 지혜를 빌려
　태양의 돌을 만든 것이냐?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28448.zh-Hans:
<voice 04623_00028448><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>杜拉，夸巴尔那说的是真的吗？
难道你真是借助他的智慧，
才创造出太阳之石的？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28448.zh-Hant:
<voice 04623_00028448><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>杜拉，夸亞巴爾納說的是真的嗎？
難道你真是借助他的智慧，
才創造出太陽石的？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4990.en: <voice 04672_00004990><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Yes... It appears so.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4990.ja:
<voice 04672_00004990><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「はい……。
　どうやら　そのようです。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4990.ko:
<voice 04672_00004990><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 예…….
　아무래도 그런 것 같습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4990.zh-Hans:
<voice 04672_00004990><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>是的……
看来确实是那样。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4990.zh-Hant:
<voice 04672_00004990><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>是的……
看來確實是那樣。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4991.en:
<voice 04761_00004991><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>That a man of your caliber could
be taken advantage of by a monster...<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4991.ja:
<voice 04761_00004991><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「お前ほどの者が　功をあせり
　魔物に　つけこまれるとは……。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4991.ko:
<voice 04761_00004991><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그대 같은 유능한 인재가 공명심에 눈이 멀어
　마물에게 이용당하다니…….<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4991.zh-Hans:
<voice 04761_00004991><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>没想到你竟然因为抢功
而招来怪物……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4991.zh-Hant:
<voice 04761_00004991><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>沒想到你竟然會因為搶功
而被怪物利用……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4992.en:
Wealth, fame, knowledge... You have no doubt seen what happens to Dwarves who seek
too much of these things.
4992.ja:
<voice 04850_00004992><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「富　名声　知識……。
　それらを求めすぎた　ドワーフたちの末路を
　知らぬわけでは　あるまいに。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4992.ko:
<voice 04850_00004992><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 부, 명성, 지식…….
　그것들을 과하게 탐낸 드워프의 말로를
　그대가 모르지 않을 터이거늘.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4992.zh-Hans:
<voice 04850_00004992><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>财富、名誉、知识……
多瓦夫同胞们过度追求那些东西的下场，
你明明再清楚不过了。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4992.zh-Hant:
<voice 04850_00004992><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>財富、名譽、知識……
多瓦夫同胞們過度追求那些東西的下場，
你明明再清楚不過了。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4993.en:
<voice 04974_00004993><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I... No matter what, I wanted to save this country!
I had to save it!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4993.ja:
<voice 04974_00004993><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「私は……　どうしても　この国を救いたかった！
　救わなくては　ならなかったんだ！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4993.ko:
<voice 04974_00004993><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 전…… 꼭 이 나라를 구하고 싶었습니다!
　구해야만 했습니다!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4993.zh-Hans:
<voice 04974_00004993><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我……我无论如何都想救这个国家！
我不能不救这个国家！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4993.zh-Hant:
<voice 04974_00004993><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我……我無論如何都想要救這個國家！
我不能不救這個國家！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4994.en:
<voice 05133_00004994><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>King Woolard!
You recognize these three dots
on my hand, don't you?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4994.ja:
<voice 05133_00004994><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ウラード国王っ！
　あなたは　この３つのホクロに
　見覚えがあるはずだ！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4994.ko:
<voice 05133_00004994><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 울라드 국왕 전하!
　전하께서는 이 3개의 점을
　기억하실 테죠!?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4994.zh-Hans:
<voice 05133_00004994><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>乌拉德国王！
你应该记得
这３颗痣才对吧！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4994.zh-Hant:
<voice 05133_00004994><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>烏拉德國王！
你應該記得
這３顆痣才對吧！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4995.en:
<voice 05237_00004995><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I am the child of three stars, the one
you abandoned for the sake of your
country!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4995.ja:
<voice 05237_00004995><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「私は　国のために　あなたに捨てられた
　３つの星をつかむ子です！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4995.ko:
<voice 05237_00004995><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 전 나라를 위해 당신에게 버림받은
　3개의 별을 지닌 아이입니다!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4995.zh-Hans:
<voice 05237_00004995><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>你为了国家而抛弃的
手握三颗星之子，就是我！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4995.zh-Hant:
<voice 05237_00004995><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>你為了國家而拋棄的
手握三顆星之子，就是我！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4996.en:
I wanted to make you apologize for your mistake in abandoning me, and save Dolworm in place of my
useless brother, Ramiza!
4996.ja:
<voice 05326_00004996><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「無能な兄　ラミザに代わって　ドルワームを救い
　私を捨てたのは　まちがいだったと
　あなたに　謝罪させたかったのです！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4996.ko:
<voice 05326_00004996><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 무능한 형 라미자 대신 도르웜을 구해
　절 버린 것은 실수였다고
　당신에게 사과받고 싶었습니다!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4996.zh-Hans:
<voice 05326_00004996><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我代替无能的兄长拉米撒拯救了多尔瓦姆，
我想让你知道抛弃我是错误的决定，
并且要你为这件事道歉！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4996.zh-Hant:
<voice 05326_00004996><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我代替無能的兄長拉米撒拯救了多爾瓦姆，
我想讓你知道拋棄我是錯誤的決定，
並且要你為這件事道歉！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4997.en: <voice 05466_00004997><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Dura is... My brother...?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4997.ja: <voice 05466_00004997><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ドゥラくんが……　ボクの弟………。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4997.ko: <voice 05466_00004997><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 두라가…… 내 동생………?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4997.zh-Hans: <voice 05466_00004997><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>杜拉是……我的弟弟……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4997.zh-Hant: <voice 05466_00004997><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>杜拉是……我的弟弟……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4998.ja: <voice 05525_00004998><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「おろかな……。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4998.zh-Hans: <voice 05525_00004998><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>何其愚蠢……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4998.zh-Hant: <voice 05525_00004998><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>何其愚蠢……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

4999.en:
<voice 05614_00004999><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Now is not the time to discuss this.
For now, we must deal with that monster
Kukulkannibal!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4999.ja:
<voice 05614_00004999><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「その話は　あとだ。
　今は　あの魔物……天魔クァバルナを
　なんとかせねば！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4999.ko:
<voice 05614_00004999><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그런 얘기를 할 때가 아니다.
　지금은 그 마물……
　천마 콰바르나를 막아야 한다!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4999.zh-Hans:
<voice 05614_00004999><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>那件事之后再说。
现在我们……要设法
解决天魔夸巴尔那才行。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
4999.zh-Hant:
<voice 05614_00004999><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>那件事之後再說。
現在我們……要設法
解決天魔夸亞巴爾納才行。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5000.en:
<voice 05703_00005000><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Do any of you have any idea where
that thing might be headed!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5000.ja:
<voice 05703_00005000><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「ヤツが　向かった先に
　心当たりのある者は　いるか！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5000.ko:
<voice 05703_00005000><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 놈이 간 곳이
　짐작되는 자는 없나!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5000.zh-Hans:
<voice 05703_00005000><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>有没有人
知道那家伙的去向？！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5000.zh-Hant:
<voice 05703_00005000><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>有沒有人
知道那傢伙的去向！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5001.en:
<voice 05792_00005001><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>...Perhaps the Boronus Hole at the
western end of the continent.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5001.ja:
<voice 05792_00005001><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……おそらく　この大陸の西の果て
　ボロヌスの穴かと。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5001.ko:
<voice 05792_00005001><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……아마도 이 대륙 서쪽 끝에 있는
　보르누스 구덩이일 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5001.zh-Hans:
<voice 05792_00005001><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……恐怕是在这个大陆西边尽头的
勃洛努斯洞穴。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5001.zh-Hant:
<voice 05792_00005001><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……恐怕是在這個大陸西邊盡頭的
勃洛努斯洞穴。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5002.en:
According to ancient texts, Kukulkannibal's body and soul were split apart; its body sealed in the
fountain inside of the hole.
5002.ja:
<voice 05872_00005002><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「古文書によると　天魔クァバルナは
　肉体と魂に分けられ　ボロヌスの穴の泉に
　その肉体が　封印されたとあるのです。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5002.ko:
<voice 05872_00005002><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 고문서에 따르면 천마 콰바르나는
　육체와 영혼으로 분리된 후 보르누스 구덩이의
　샘에 육체를 봉인당했다고 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5002.zh-Hans:
<voice 05872_00005002><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>根据古籍记载，天魔夸巴尔那的
肉体与灵魂被分开，
肉体封印在勃洛努斯洞穴的泉水中。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5002.zh-Hant:
<voice 05872_00005002><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>根據古籍記載，
天魔夸亞巴爾納的肉體與靈魂被分開，
肉體被封印在勃洛努斯洞穴的泉水中。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5003.en:
<voice 05971_00005003><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Very well! Ramiza!
Lead the chivalry to the Boronus Hole!
And Dura, you go with them!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5003.ja:
<voice 05971_00005003><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「よし！　ラミザよ。
　騎士団を率いて　ボロヌスの穴へ向かうのじゃ！
　ドゥラ　お前も　一緒に行くように！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5003.ko:
<voice 05971_00005003><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그렇단 말이지! 라미자.
　기사단을 이끌고 보르누스 구덩이로 가거라!
　두라, 그대도 함께 가도록!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5003.zh-Hans:
<voice 05971_00005003><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>好！拉米撒，
立即率领骑士团，前往勃洛努斯洞穴！
杜拉，你也一起去！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5003.zh-Hant:
<voice 05971_00005003><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>好！拉米撒，
立即率領騎士團，前往勃洛努斯洞穴！
杜拉，你也一起去！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5005.ja: <voice 06109_00005005><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「は　はいっ……。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5005.ko: <voice 06109_00005005><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 아, 알겠습니다…….<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5006.en:
<voice 06227_00005006><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I had no idea that Kukulkannibal's
soul was sealed inside the Calsadora
Volcano... Why didn't I realize it sooner!?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5006.ja:
<voice 06227_00005006><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「まさか　クァバルナの魂が
　カルサドラ火山に　封じられていたとは……。
　なぜ　私は　気づかなかった！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5006.ko:
<voice 06227_00005006><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 설마 콰바르나의 영혼이
　칼사드라 화산에 봉인되어 있을 줄이야…….
　왜 알아차리지 못한 거지!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5006.zh-Hans:
<voice 06227_00005006><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>夸巴尔那的灵魂
竟然被封印在卡尔萨多拉火山……
为什么我没有注意到？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5006.zh-Hant:
<voice 06227_00005006><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>夸亞巴爾納的靈魂
竟然被封印在卡爾薩朵拉火山……
為什麼我沒有注意到？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5007.en:
<voice 06304_00005007><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>This is my responsibility...
I will defeat that monster,
even if it costs me my life!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5007.ja:
<voice 06304_00005007><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「私の責任だ……。
　この命に代えても　クァバルナを討つ！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5007.ko:
<voice 06304_00005007><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 이건 내 책임이야…….
　내 목숨을 바쳐서라도 콰바르나를 물리치겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5007.zh-Hans:
<voice 06304_00005007><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>这是我的责任……
即使赔上这条命，我也要打倒夸巴尔那！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5007.zh-Hant:
<voice 06304_00005007><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>這是我的責任……
即使賠上這條命，我也要打倒夸亞巴爾納！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000608.en:
<voice 00000_19000608><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I'm sorry. Please wait!
You're going to help Prince
Ramiza, right?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000608.ja:
<voice 00000_19000608><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「すみません！　待ってください！
　あなたは　ラミザ王子を
　手助けに　行くのでしょう？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000608.ko:
<voice 00000_19000608><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 실례합니다! 잠시만요!
　라미자 왕자를
　도우러 가는 길이시죠?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000608.zh-Hans:
<voice 00000_19000608><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>不好意思！请等一下！
你是要去帮助
拉米撒王子的吧？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000608.zh-Hant:
<voice 00000_19000608><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>不好意思！請等一下！
你是要去幫助
拉米撒王子的吧？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000609.en:
<voice 00001_19000609><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I'm the one who broke the seal on
Kukulkannibal and unleashed it on this
country... I must atone for my actions.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000609.ja:
<voice 00001_19000609><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「私は　天魔クァバルナの封印を解き
　この国を　窮地に追い込んでしまいました。
　この罪は　償われなくてはならない。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000609.ko:
<voice 00001_19000609><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 저는 천마 콰바르나의 봉인을 풀어
　이 나라를 궁지로 몰아넣고 말았습니다.
　이 죄를 갚아야만 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000609.zh-Hans:
<voice 00001_19000609><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我解开了天魔夸巴尔那的封印，
害这个国家被逼入绝境。
我必须赎罪才行。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000609.zh-Hant:
<voice 00001_19000609><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>我解開了天魔夸亞巴爾納的封印，
害這個國家被逼入絕境。
我必須贖罪才行。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000610.en:
<voice 00002_19000610><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>And, moreover, its because of me
that Prince Ramiza is facing this crisis.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000610.ja:
<voice 00002_19000610><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ましてや　私のせいで
　ラミザ王子が　危機に立ち向かうなど……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000610.ko:
<voice 00002_19000610><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 하물며 저 때문에
　라미자 왕자가 위기에 맞서야 한다니……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000610.zh-Hans:
<voice 00002_19000610><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>而且拉米撒王子还因为我
挺身面对危机……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000610.zh-Hant:
<voice 00002_19000610><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>而且拉米撒王子還因為我
而挺身面對危機……<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000611.en:
<voice 00003_19000611><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>There's no way he can do it alone.
I must help or Ramiza will die!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000611.ja:
<voice 00003_19000611><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「できるわけが　ないのです！
　あの人が　天魔退治など！！！
　ラミザ王子が……兄が死んでしまう！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000611.ko:
<voice 00003_19000611><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 가능할 리가 없어요!
　그 사람이 어떻게 천마를 퇴치합니까!!!
　라미자 왕자가…… 형이 죽을 거예요!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000611.zh-Hans:
<voice 00003_19000611><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那个人怎么可能
有办法击退天魔！！！
拉米撒王子他……哥哥他会没命的！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000611.zh-Hant:
<voice 00003_19000611><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>那個人怎麼可能
有辦法擊退天魔！！！
拉米撒王子他……哥哥他會沒命的！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000612.en: <voice 00004_19000612><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Please! Take me with you!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000612.ja:
<voice 00004_19000612><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「お願いです。
　私も一緒に連れて行ってください！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000612.ko:
<voice 00004_19000612><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 부탁입니다.
　저도 함께 데려가 주세요!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000612.zh-Hans:
<voice 00004_19000612><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>拜托你了，
请带我一起去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000612.zh-Hant:
<voice 00004_19000612><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>拜託你了，
請帶我一起去吧！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000613.en:
<voice 00005_19000613><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>My country and my brother... Even at the cost of my
own life, I must save them!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000613.ja:
<voice 00005_19000613><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「国を　兄を……
　この命に代えてでも　助けなければ！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000613.ko:
<voice 00005_19000613><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 나라를, 형을……
　제 목숨과 바꿔서라도 구할 겁니다!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000613.zh-Hans:
<voice 00005_19000613><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>就算是牺牲这条命……
我也必须保护国家、保护哥哥！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000613.zh-Hant:
<voice 00005_19000613><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>就算是犧牲這條命……
我也必須保護國家、保護哥哥！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000614.de: Dura tritt der Gruppe bei!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000614.en: Dura joined the party!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000614.es: ¡Dura se une al grupo!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000614.fr: Dura se joint à l'équipe!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000614.it: Dura si unisce al gruppo!<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000614.ja:
ドゥラが
パーティに　加わった。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000614.zh-Hans:
杜拉
加入了队伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>
19000614.zh-Hant:
杜拉
加入了隊伍。<se_nots System Guest_joinSE>

5008.en:
<voice 00130_00005008><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>That Dura... What a foolish thing he's
done. Him of all people, bringing
that horrible Kukulkannibal here...<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5008.ja:
<voice 00130_00005008><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「ドゥラめ……。なんという
　おろかなことをしてくれたのじゃ。
　よりにもよって　あの天魔クァバルナを……。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5008.ko:
<voice 00130_00005008><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 두라…… 그 녀석이
　이런 어리석은 짓을 벌이다니.
　하필이면 천마 콰바르나를…….<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5008.zh-Hans:
<voice 00130_00005008><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>杜拉这家伙……居然干了
那么愚蠢的事。
偏偏把那个天魔夸巴尔那……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5008.zh-Hant:
<voice 00130_00005008><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>杜拉這傢伙……
居然幹了那麼愚蠢的事。
偏偏將那個天魔夸亞巴爾納……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5009.en:
<voice 00180_00005009><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>However... This is all because of my
mistake in abandoning my beloved
child...<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5009.ja:
<voice 00180_00005009><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「しかし　それもすべて
　愛しい我が子を　捨ててしまった
　わしの過ちが　原因なのだな……。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5009.ko:
<voice 00180_00005009><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이것도 다
　사랑하는 자식을 버린
　내 업보가 초래한 일인가…….<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5009.zh-Hans:
<voice 00180_00005009><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>不过，这一切都是我的错，
都是因为我抛弃了
亲爱的孩子……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5009.zh-Hant:
<voice 00180_00005009><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>不過，這一切都是我的錯，
都是因為我拋棄了
親愛的孩子……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5106.en:
<voice 00305_00005106><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>Your Majesty... What happened was
for the sake of this country.
Please don't blame yourself.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5106.ja:
<voice 00305_00005106><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「国王様……。
　その件は　国を想うため　仕方のなかったこと。
　どうか　ご自分を責めないでください。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5106.ko:
<voice 00305_00005106><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 전하…….
　그건 나라를 생각해 내리신 결단이지 않습니까.
　부디 자책하지 마십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5106.zh-Hans:
<voice 00305_00005106><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>国王陛下……
那也是为了国家着想，没办法的事。
请您不要自责。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5106.zh-Hant:
<voice 00305_00005106><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>國王陛下……
那也是為了國家著想，沒辦法的事。
請您不要自責。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28441.en:
<voice 00335_00028441><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>And I am sure that Prince Ramiza
will defeat Kukulkannibal.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28441.ja:
<voice 00335_00028441><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「それに　ラミザ王子が　きっと
　天魔クァバルナを　討ってくださると
　私は　信じております。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28441.ko:
<voice 00335_00028441><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 그리고 전 라미자 왕자님께서
　반드시 천마 콰바르나를
　물리쳐 주시리라고 믿습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28441.zh-Hans:
<voice 00335_00028441><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>而且，我相信拉米撒王子
一定能打败
天魔夸巴尔那的。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28441.zh-Hant:
<voice 00335_00028441><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>而且，我相信拉米撒王子
一定能打敗
天魔夸亞巴爾納的。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5108.en:
<voice 00395_00005108><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>You are from the Royal Research Institute, aren't you?
Chiri, was it...?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5108.ja:
<voice 00395_00005108><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「そなたは　たしか　王立研究院の者だったな。
　名は　チリと申したか。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5108.ko:
<voice 00395_00005108><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그대는 왕립 연구원 소속이었지.
　이름이 치리였던가?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5108.zh-Hans:
<voice 00395_00005108><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你好像是王立研究院的人吧。
名字叫琪莉吗？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5108.zh-Hant:
<voice 00395_00005108><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你好像是王立研究院的人吧。
是叫琪莉嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28442.en:
<voice 00465_00028442><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>...I must thank you. You are right.
For now, I will trust Ramiza and wait.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28442.ja:
<voice 00465_00028442><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「……礼を言わねばな。そなたの申す通りじゃ。
　今は　ラミザを信じ　待つことにしよう。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28442.ko:
<voice 00465_00028442><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: ……고맙구나. 그대의 말이 맞다.
　지금은 라미자를 믿고 기다리기로 하지.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28442.zh-Hans:
<voice 00465_00028442><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>……我得谢谢你。你说得没错，
我就相信拉米撒，等他回来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28442.zh-Hant:
<voice 00465_00028442><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>……我得謝謝妳。妳說得沒錯，
我就相信拉米撒，等他回來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28444.en:
<voice 00590_00028444><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>A traveler?
I hate to say it, but you've come to
this kingdom at quite a bad time.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28444.ja:
<voice 00590_00028444><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「そなたは　旅の者か。
　こんなときに　ドルワームを訪れるとは
　ついておらんかったな。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28444.ko:
<voice 00590_00028444><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그대는 여행자인가?
　하필 이런 시기에 도르웜을
　방문하다니 운이 없군.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28444.zh-Hans:
<voice 00590_00028444><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你是旅行者吗？
在这种时候来到多尔瓦姆，
你运气还真背。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28444.zh-Hant:
<voice 00590_00028444><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你是旅人嗎？
在這種時候來到多爾瓦姆，
你運氣還真背。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28445.en:
<voice 00671_00028445><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>...Ho, they do seem to be quite skilled...
How about it? Will you aid in
the defeat of the Kukulkannibal?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28445.ja:
<voice 00671_00028445><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「……ほう。なかなか　ウデの立ちそうな旅人だ。
　どうじゃ？　そなたさえよければ
　天魔クァバルナを討つ　手助けをしてくれぬか？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28445.ko:
<voice 00671_00028445><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: ……흐음, 제법 실력이 좋아 보이는군.
　어떤가? 그대만 괜찮다면
　천마 콰바르나 토벌을 도와주지 않겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28445.zh-Hans:
<voice 00671_00028445><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>……哦，你这旅行者看似身手不凡。
怎么样？方便的话，
希望你能帮助我们讨伐天魔夸巴尔那。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28445.zh-Hant:
<voice 00671_00028445><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>……喔，你這旅人身手真不錯。
怎麼樣？方便的話，
希望你能幫助我們討伐天魔夸亞巴爾納。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28446.en:
<voice 00701_00028446><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>It's not that I don't trust Ramiza, but I'm sure he'd
feel more confident in himself with more companions
by his side.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28446.ja:
<voice 00701_00028446><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「ラミザを　信頼していないわけではないが
　ひとりでも　味方が増えたほうが
　きっと　あやつも　心強いじゃろう。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28446.ko:
<voice 00701_00028446><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 라미자를 믿지 않는 건 아니지만
　한 사람이라도 전력이 많은 편이
　그 녀석도 든든할 테니 말일세.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28446.zh-Hans:
<voice 00701_00028446><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我不是不信任拉米撒，
但如果能多一个帮手
一定也能让他增添信心。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28446.zh-Hant:
<voice 00701_00028446><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我不是不信任拉米撒，
但如果能多一個幫手
一定也能讓他增添信心。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28447.en:
<voice 00731_00028447><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>I heard that the Demon Kukulkannibal has made its
way towards the Boronus Hole to
the far west. Don't worry, you will be rewarded for your efforts!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28447.ja:
<voice 00731_00028447><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「天魔クァバルナは　この大陸の西の果て
　ボロヌスの穴に　向かったそうじゃ。
　活躍次第では　ほうびをとらせようぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28447.ko:
<voice 00731_00028447><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 천마 콰바르나는 이 대륙 서쪽 끝에 있는
　보르누스 구덩이로 갔다고 하더군.
　활약 여하에 따라서는 포상을 내리겠네.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28447.zh-Hans:
<voice 00731_00028447><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>听说天魔夸巴尔那已经往
大陆西边尽头的勃洛努斯洞穴去了。
要是你能立功，自然会获得丰厚报酬。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
28447.zh-Hant:
<voice 00731_00028447><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>聽說天魔夸亞巴爾納已經往
大陸西邊盡頭的勃洛努斯洞穴去了。
要是你能立功，自然會獲得豐厚報酬。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5013.en: <voice 00683_00005013><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>MY BODY... MY GLORIOUS BODY...<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5013.ja: <voice 00683_00005013><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>「我ノ　身体……　我ノ　美しい……。<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5013.ko: <voice 00683_00005013><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>: 내 몸…… 내 아름다운 몸…….<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5013.zh-Hans: <voice 00683_00005013><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>我的肉体……我美丽的……<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5013.zh-Hant: <voice 00683_00005013><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>我的肉體……我美麗的……<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5014.en: <voice 00768_00005014><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>HOW DARE... HOW DARE YOU...!!<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5014.ja: <voice 00768_00005014><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>「よくモ……　よくも　このような……！！<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5014.ko: <voice 00768_00005014><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>: 잘도…… 잘도 이렇게 만들었겠다……!!<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5014.zh-Hans: <voice 00768_00005014><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>竟然……竟然这样……！！<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5014.zh-Hant: <voice 00768_00005014><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>竟敢……竟敢如此……！！<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5015.ja: <voice 01203_00005015><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>「クゥェェエエアアアッ！！！<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5016.en: <voice 01293_00005016><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>IT'S BEEN SO LONG... MY... MY BELOVED BODY...<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5016.ja:
<voice 01293_00005016><start_lip_sync m50024 _normal m00001>「長かっタ……。
　我ノ……　我の　いとしイ身体……。<stop_lip_animation m50024 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5016.ko:
