成功打倒夸亞巴爾納了吧？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001545.en:
<voice 00471_00005036><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>This traveler is responsible for his
defeat. When we got there, the battle
was already over.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001545.ja: <voice 00471_00005036><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「天魔クァバルナを倒したのは　あの者です。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001545.ko: <voice 00471_00005036><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 천마 콰바르나를 쓰러뜨린 건 저자입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001545.zh-Hans: <voice 00471_00005036><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>将天魔夸巴尔那解决掉的是这位。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001545.zh-Hant: <voice 00471_00005036><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>打倒天魔夸亞巴爾納的是那位。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5037.en: <voice 00515_00005037><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>What!? Is that true?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5037.ja: <voice 00515_00005037><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「なんと！　それは　まことか？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5037.ko: <voice 00515_00005037><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 뭐라!? 그게 사실인가?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5037.zh-Hans: <voice 00515_00005037><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>天啊！这是真的吗？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5037.zh-Hant: <voice 00515_00005037><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>天啊！這是真的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5038.en:
<voice 00630_00005038><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Traveler who claims to have defeated
Kukulkannibal. Please come here.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5038.ja:
<voice 00630_00005038><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「クァバルナを倒したという旅人よ。
　こちらへ　参られよ。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5038.ko:
<voice 00630_00005038><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 콰바르나를 쓰러뜨린 여행자여.
　이리 가까이 오도록.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5038.zh-Hans:
<voice 00630_00005038><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>打倒了夸巴尔那的旅行者啊，
请到这边来。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5038.zh-Hant:
<voice 00630_00005038><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>打倒了夸亞巴爾納的旅人啊，
過來這裡吧。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5039.en: <voice 00837_00005039><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>And what is your name?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5039.ja: <voice 00837_00005039><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「そなた　名は　なんと申す？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5039.ko: <voice 00837_00005039><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그대, 이름이 뭔가?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5039.zh-Hans: <voice 00837_00005039><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你叫什么名字？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5039.zh-Hant: <voice 00837_00005039><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你叫什麼名字？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5040.en:
<voice 00864_00005040><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001><pc>... I see...
I apologize for the trouble I caused you
with mismanagement of my vassals.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5040.ja:
<voice 00864_00005040><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「……そうか　<pc>というのか。
　<pc>よ。我が家臣の不始末で
　そなたには　迷惑をかけたようだ。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5040.ko:
<voice 00864_00005040><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: ……그래, {pc}|hpp(이란,란) 말이지.
　<pc>, 내 가신의 불찰로
　그대를 번거롭게 했군.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5040.zh-Hans:
<voice 00864_00005040><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>……你叫<pc>啊。
<pc>啊，因为家臣们的疏忽，
给你添麻烦了。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5040.zh-Hant:
<voice 00864_00005040><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>……你叫<pc>啊。
<pc>啊，因為家臣們的疏忽，
給你添麻煩了。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5041.en:
<voice 00905_00005041><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>In recognition of your hard work
and brave deeds...<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5041.ja: <voice 00905_00005041><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「そなたのはたらきと　勇気をたたえ……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5041.ko: <voice 00905_00005041><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그대의 공적과 용기를 치하해……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5041.zh-Hans: <voice 00905_00005041><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>就让我赞美你的勇气与辛劳……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5041.zh-Hant: <voice 00905_00005041><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>就讓我讚美你的勇氣與辛勞……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5042.en: <voice 01145_00005042><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Th-the Sun Stone!! What's happened!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5042.ja:
<voice 01145_00005042><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「た　太陽の石がっ！！
　いったい　何が起こったのじゃ！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5042.ko:
<voice 01145_00005042><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 태, 태양의 돌이!!
　대체 어떻게 된 거지!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5042.zh-Hans:
<voice 01145_00005042><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>太、太阳之石！！
到底发生了什么事？！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5042.zh-Hant:
<voice 01145_00005042><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>太、太陽石！！
到底發生了什麼事！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5043.ja: <voice 01365_00005043><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「こ　これは……。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5043.ko: <voice 01365_00005043><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 이, 이건…….<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5044.en:
With all due respect, your Majesty, but there are some Miasmites that failed to become Sun Stones.
That must be the problem.
5044.ja:
<voice 01405_00005044><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「恐れながら　国王様。
　一部　太陽の石になりきれなかった魔瘴石があり
　それが　悪さをしているのでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5044.ko:
<voice 01405_00005044><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 황송하오나, 전하.
　일부 마장석이 온전히 태양의 돌이 되지 못해
　말썽을 일으킨 게 아닐까 싶습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5044.zh-Hans:
<voice 01405_00005044><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>恕我直言，陛下。
有一些没变成太阳之石的魔瘴石，
应该就是那些东西在作怪。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5044.zh-Hant:
<voice 01405_00005044><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>恕我直言，陛下。
有一些沒變成太陽石的魔瘴石，
應該就是那些東西在作怪。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5045.en: <voice 01476_00005045><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>So, what should we do...?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5045.ja: <voice 01476_00005045><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「では　どうすれば……？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5045.ko: <voice 01476_00005045><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그렇다면 어찌해야 하는가……?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5045.zh-Hans: <voice 01476_00005045><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>该怎么做……？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5045.zh-Hant: <voice 01476_00005045><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>該怎麼做……？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5046.en:
<voice 01545_00005046><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>You must stop the stone.
Only those of Dolworm's royal blood
can control the Sun Stone's power!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5046.ja:
<voice 01545_00005046><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「この暴走を　止めるのです。
　太陽の石のチカラを　制御できるのは
　ドルワーム王家の血を　引く者のみ！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5046.ko:
<voice 01545_00005046><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 폭주를 막아야 합니다.
　태양의 돌의 힘을 제어할 수 있는 건
　도르웜 왕가의 피를 이어받은 자뿐!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5046.zh-Hans:
<voice 01545_00005046><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>必须阻止它失控。
能控制太阳之石力量的，
唯有继承了多尔瓦姆王家血脉之人！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5046.zh-Hant:
<voice 01545_00005046><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>必須阻止它失控。
只有繼承了多爾瓦姆王家血脈之人
才能控制太陽石的力量！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5047.en:
<voice 01670_00005047><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>I shall stop it!
That way, I can prove that I am the
true prince of this country!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5047.ja:
<voice 01670_00005047><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「私が　止めてみせましょう！
　それが　私が　この国の王子であるという
　何よりの証になる！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5047.ko:
<voice 01670_00005047><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 제가 막겠습니다!
　그게 제가 이 왕국의 왕자라는
　가장 확실한 증거가 될 테니까요!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5047.zh-Hans:
<voice 01670_00005047><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>就让我阻止给你看！
这就是我身为这个国家的王子
最好的证明！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5047.zh-Hant:
<voice 01670_00005047><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>就讓我阻止給你看！
這就是我身為這個國家的王子
最好的證明！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5048.en: <voice 01736_00005048><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Don't bother! You are not of royalty!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5048.ja: <voice 01736_00005048><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「ムダじゃ！　お前は　王家の者ではない！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5048.ko:
<voice 01736_00005048><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 소용없다!
　그대는 이 왕가의 핏줄이 아니다!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5048.zh-Hans: <voice 01736_00005048><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>没用的！你不是王家的人！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5048.zh-Hant: <voice 01736_00005048><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>沒用的！你不是王家的人！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5049.en: <voice 01845_00005049><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Why can't you just admit it!?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5049.ja: <voice 01845_00005049><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「なぜ　認めないっ！？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5049.ko: <voice 01845_00005049><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 왜 인정하지 않으십니까!?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5049.zh-Hans: <voice 01845_00005049><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>为何不承认？！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5049.zh-Hant: <voice 01845_00005049><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>為何不承認！？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5050.en:
You abandoned your own child for your country! If you really think you did the right thing, you deserve to be
recognized for it!!
5050.ja:
<voice 01895_00005050><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「国のために　子を捨てたのでしょう！？
　正しいことをしたと思っているのなら
　認められるはずです！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5050.ko:
<voice 01895_00005050><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 나라를 위해 자식을 버리신 것 아닙니까!?
　올바른 선택을 했다고 생각하신다면
　인정 못 하실 이유가 없을 텐데요!?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5050.zh-Hans:
<voice 01895_00005050><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>你为了国家舍弃了自己的孩子吧？！
若你认为自己做得没错，
那有什么不敢承认的！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5050.zh-Hant:
<voice 01895_00005050><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>你為了國家捨棄了自己的孩子吧！？
若你認為自己做得沒錯，
那有什麼不敢承認的！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5051.en:
<voice 01975_00005051><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>But the sin of abandoning your child
will never go away!
Neither will my resentment for you!!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5051.ja:
<voice 01975_00005051><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「だが　子を捨てた罪は　決して消えない！
　私の恨みも　消えることはない……！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5051.ko:
<voice 01975_00005051><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 하지만 자식을 버린 죄는 사라지지 않습니다!
　제 원망도 사라지지 않을 겁니다……!!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5051.zh-Hans:
<voice 01975_00005051><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>可你遗弃了孩子的罪过永远不会消失！
我的憎恨也不会消失……！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5051.zh-Hant:
<voice 01975_00005051><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>可你遺棄了孩子的罪過永遠不會消失！
我的憎恨也不會消失……！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5052.en:
<voice 02080_00005052><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Don't you see!?
I am the abandoned prince!!!!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5052.ja:
<voice 02080_00005052><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「見ろっ！！
　私が　捨てられた王子だ！！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5052.ko:
<voice 02080_00005052><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 보아라!!
　내가 버림받은 왕자다!!!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5052.zh-Hans:
<voice 02080_00005052><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>看吧！！
我就是被遗弃的王子！！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5052.zh-Hant:
<voice 02080_00005052><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>看吧！！
我就是被遺棄的王子！！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5053.en: <voice 02445_00005053><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Stop! Sun Stone!! Stop this rampage!!!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5053.ja:
<voice 02445_00005053><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「止まれ！　太陽の石よ！！
　暴走をやめろ！！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5053.ko:
<voice 02445_00005053><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 멈춰라! 태양의 돌이여!!
　폭주를 멈춰라!!!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5053.zh-Hans:
<voice 02445_00005053><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>停下吧！太阳之石啊！！
安静下来吧！！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5053.zh-Hant:
<voice 02445_00005053><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>停下吧！太陽石！！
別再失控了！！！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5054.en: <voice 02585_00005054><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>....Why? Why won't it stop!?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5054.ja: <voice 02585_00005054><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「……なぜだっ！　なぜ　止まらない！？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5054.ko: <voice 02585_00005054><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: ……왜지!? 왜 멈추지 않는 거야!?<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5054.zh-Hans: <voice 02585_00005054><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……为什么！为何停不下来？！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5054.zh-Hant: <voice 02585_00005054><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>……為什麼！為何停不下來！？<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5055.en: <voice 02887_00005055><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>The child that I abandoned...<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5055.ja: <voice 02887_00005055><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「わしが　かつて　捨てた子は……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5055.ko: <voice 02887_00005055><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 일찍이 내가 버린 아이는……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5055.zh-Hans: <voice 02887_00005055><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我遗弃的那孩子……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5055.zh-Hant: <voice 02887_00005055><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我遺棄的那孩子……<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5056.en: <voice 02945_00005056><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>...Was a girl.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5056.ja: <voice 02945_00005056><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「女の子なのじゃよ。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5056.zh-Hans: <voice 02945_00005056><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>是女孩啊。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5056.zh-Hant: <voice 02945_00005056><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>是女孩啊。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5058.en:
<voice 03475_00005058><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>Your Majesty, I need your help! If we
don't do something about the Sun Stone
now, the whole castle is history!!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5058.ja:
<voice 03475_00005058><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「国王様っ！　チカラをお貸しください！
　早く　太陽の石を抑えないと
　お城が　ふき飛んでしまいます！！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5058.ko:
<voice 03475_00005058><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 전하! 힘을 빌려주세요!
　어서 태양의 돌을 제어하지 않으면
　성이 날아갈 겁니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5058.zh-Hans:
<voice 03475_00005058><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>国王陛下！请您抑制太阳之石！
再不阻止的话，
城堡就要不保了！！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5058.zh-Hant:
<voice 03475_00005058><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>國王陛下！請借我力量！
再不快點抑制住太陽石，
城堡就要不保了！！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

Is my power not enough...!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 04116_00005060><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 멈추질 않아……!
　내 힘만으로는 부족한 것인가!?<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5060.zh-Hans:
<voice 04116_00005060><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>阻止不了……！
只凭我的力量，是不够的吗？！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5060.zh-Hant:
<voice 04116_00005060><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>阻止不了……！
只憑我的力量，是不夠的嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5063.ja: <voice 04326_00005063><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「ラミザ王子！？<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5064.en:
<voice 04415_00005064><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>*sob* Poor Dura...
He's worked so hard...
...To get this far... *sob*<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5064.ja:
<voice 04415_00005064><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ううっ。ドゥラくん　かわいそう……。
　ここまで　一生懸命……
　がんばって　きたのに……　ううっ……。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5064.ko:
<voice 04415_00005064><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 으흑, 두라가 너무 가엾어…….
　지금까지 그렇게 열심해……
　노력했는데…… 으흑…….<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5064.zh-Hans:
<voice 04415_00005064><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>唔唔，杜拉，真可怜啊……
好不容易……
拼了命才来到这里的……唔唔……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5064.zh-Hant:
<voice 04415_00005064><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>唔唔，杜拉，真可憐啊……
好不容易……
拚了命才來到這裡的……唔唔……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5065.en:
<voice 04505_00005065><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>He's more of a prince... Than I'll ever be...
...And he's not even a prince...<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5065.ja:
<voice 04505_00005065><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ボクより……　王子らしいのに……
　王子じゃないなんて………。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5065.ko:
<voice 04505_00005065><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 나보다…… 훨씬 왕자 같은데……
　왕자가 아니라니……….<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5065.zh-Hans:
<voice 04505_00005065><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>比我更像个王子……
却不是真正的王子……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5065.zh-Hant:
<voice 04505_00005065><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>比我還更像個王子……
卻不是真正的王子……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5066.en: <voice 04635_00005066><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>Prince, please! Please help us too!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5066.ja:
<voice 04635_00005066><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「王子　お願いです！
　チカラを貸してください！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5066.ko:
<voice 04635_00005066><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 왕자님, 부탁드려요!
　힘을 빌려주세요!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5066.zh-Hans:
<voice 04635_00005066><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>王子，拜托您了！
快帮帮国王！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5066.zh-Hant:
<voice 04635_00005066><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>王子，拜託您了！
請借我您的力量！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5067.en: <voice 04715_00005067><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>It's impossible for me......<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5067.ja: <voice 04715_00005067><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ボクには　ムリだよ………。<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5067.ko: <voice 04715_00005067><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 난 못 해……….<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5067.zh-Hans: <voice 04715_00005067><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>我做不到……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5067.zh-Hant: <voice 04715_00005067><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>我不行的啦……<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5068.ja: <voice 04915_00005068><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「ラミザ王子っ！！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5068.ko: <voice 04915_00005068><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 라미자 왕자님!!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5068.zh-Hans: <voice 04915_00005068><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拉米撒王子！！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5068.zh-Hant: <voice 04915_00005068><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拉米撒王子！！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5070.en: <voice 05396_00005070><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>N-no way... You're!?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5070.ja: <voice 05396_00005070><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ま　まさか　キミが！？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5070.ko: <voice 05396_00005070><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 서, 설마 네가!?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5070.zh-Hans: <voice 05396_00005070><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>难、难道说是你？！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5070.zh-Hant: <voice 05396_00005070><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>難、難道說是妳！？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5071.en:
<voice 05495_00005071><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>Please, Prince Ramiza!
We really need your help!!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5071.ja:
<voice 05495_00005071><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「お願いします　ラミザ王子！
　あなたのチカラが　必要なんです！！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5071.ko:
<voice 05495_00005071><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 부탁드려요, 라미자 왕자님!
　왕자님의 힘이 필요해요!!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5071.zh-Hans:
<voice 05495_00005071><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拜托了，拉米撒王子！
我们需要你的力量！！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5071.zh-Hant:
<voice 05495_00005071><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>拜託了，拉米撒王子！
我們需要你的力量！！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5072.en:
<voice 06376_00005072><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>Nothing's working...
What should we do...?
If this keeps up, we'll all be...<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5072.ja:
<voice 06376_00005072><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「どうしよう　これでも治まらないなんて。
　このままじゃ　城ごと　私たちは……！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5072.ko:
<voice 06376_00005072><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 어떡하지, 이래도 막을 수 없다니.
　이대로 가다간 우리도 성과 함께……!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5072.zh-Hans:
<voice 06376_00005072><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>该怎么办，这样也没用。
这样下去，不只城堡，连我们都会……！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5072.zh-Hant:
<voice 06376_00005072><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>該怎麼辦，這樣也沒用。
這樣下去，不只城堡，連我們都會……！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5074.ja: <voice 06885_00005074><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「くっ……　うあああああああ！！！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5074.ko: <voice 06885_00005074><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 큭…… 으아아아아아아아!!!<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5074.zh-Hans: <voice 06885_00005074><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>唔……唔啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5074.zh-Hant: <voice 06885_00005074><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>唔……唔啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5075.en: <voice 07615_00005075><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Just now, that was... Huh?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5075.ja: <voice 07615_00005075><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「い　今のは　ボクの……　あれ？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5075.ko: <voice 07615_00005075><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 바, 방금 그걸 내가…… 어라?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5075.zh-Hans: <voice 07615_00005075><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>刚、刚才是我的……奇怪？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5075.zh-Hant: <voice 07615_00005075><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>剛、剛才是我的……奇怪？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5076.en: <voice 07755_00005076><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>Prince Ramiza, you did amazing!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5076.ja: <voice 07755_00005076><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「ラミザ王子　すごいです！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5076.ko: <voice 07755_00005076><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 라미자 왕자님, 잘하셨어요!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5076.zh-Hans: <voice 07755_00005076><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>太厉害了！拉米撒王子！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5076.zh-Hant: <voice 07755_00005076><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>太厲害了！拉米撒王子！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5077.en: <voice 07885_00005077><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Chiri... Was it. Let me see your face.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5077.ja:
<voice 07885_00005077><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「チリ……　と言ったか。
　わしに　顔を見せておくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5077.ko:
<voice 07885_00005077><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 치리……라고 했느냐.
　내게 얼굴을 보여다오.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5077.zh-Hans:
<voice 07885_00005077><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>你叫琪莉……对吧？
让我看看你的脸。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5077.zh-Hant:
<voice 07885_00005077><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>妳叫琪莉……對吧？
讓我看看妳的臉。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5078.en: <voice 08125_00005078><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>I see... It really was you.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5078.ja: <voice 08125_00005078><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「そうか……　お前だったのか。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5078.ko: <voice 08125_00005078><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그래…… 너였구나.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5078.zh-Hans: <voice 08125_00005078><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>这样啊……原来是你啊。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5078.zh-Hant: <voice 08125_00005078><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>這樣啊……原來是妳啊。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5079.en:
<voice 08296_00005079><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>I'm so sorry... At the time, I believed
that the only way to protect this
country was to let you go.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5079.ja:
<voice 08296_00005079><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「すまなかった……。
　あのとき　わしは　お前を手放す以外に
　国を守る方法はないと　信じておったのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5079.ko:
<voice 08296_00005079><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 미안하다…….
　그때 난 널 버리는 것 외에는
　나라를 지킬 방법이 없다고 믿었다.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5079.zh-Hans:
<voice 08296_00005079><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>真的很对不起……
那时我相信除了放手以外，
没有其他能够守护王国的办法了。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5079.zh-Hant:
<voice 08296_00005079><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>真的很對不起……
那時我相信除了放手以外，
沒有其他能夠守護王國的辦法了。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5080.en:
<voice 08355_00005080><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>But... As a result, many people were
hurt and a new tragedy befell our
country... I had made the wrong choice.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5080.ja:
<voice 08355_00005080><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「だが　結果的に　多くの者をキズつけ
　この国に　新たな悲劇を生んでしまった。
　わしの選択は　まちがっていたのじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5080.ko:
<voice 08355_00005080><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 하지만 결과적으로 많은 이들을 상처 입히고
　이 나라에 새로운 비극을 초래하고 말았다.
　내 선택은 오판이었어.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5080.zh-Hans:
<voice 08355_00005080><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>但最后只是让许多人受伤，
让新的悲剧在这国家中诞生而已。
是我选错了。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5080.zh-Hant:
<voice 08355_00005080><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>但最後只是讓許多人受傷，
讓新的悲劇在這國家中誕生而已。
是我選錯了。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5081.en:
<voice 08416_00005081><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Chiri, will you come and live with us here in
the palace? Your late mother had been
so upset about giving you away as well.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5081.ja:
<voice 08416_00005081><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「チリよ。この王宮で　一緒に暮らさぬか？
　亡き王妃も　お前を手放したことを
　ずっと　気に病んでおった。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5081.ko:
<voice 08416_00005081><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 치리, 이 왕궁에서 함께 살지 않겠느냐?
　죽은 왕비도 널 버린 것을
　두고두고 후회했다.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5081.zh-Hans:
<voice 08416_00005081><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>琪莉啊，你愿意在这王宫中与我一起生活吗？
去世的王妃也对遗弃你
一直很歉疚。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5081.zh-Hant:
<voice 08416_00005081><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>琪莉啊，妳願意在這王宮中與我一起生活嗎？
去世的王妃也對遺棄妳
一直感到很歉疚。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5083.en: <voice 08538_00005083><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>Thank you so much, your Majesty.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5083.ja: <voice 08538_00005083><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「ありがとうございます　国王様。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5083.ko: <voice 08538_00005083><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 감사합니다, 전하.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5083.zh-Hans: <voice 08538_00005083><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>谢谢您，国王陛下。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5083.zh-Hant: <voice 08538_00005083><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>謝謝您，國王陛下。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5084.en:
<voice 08645_00005084><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>However... I can say for certain that a
life inside this palace is not for me.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5084.ja:
<voice 08645_00005084><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「ですが……　王宮の生活は
　きっと　私には　あいません。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5084.ko:
<voice 08645_00005084><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 하지만…… 왕궁 생활은
　보나 마나 제게 안 맞을 거예요.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5084.zh-Hans:
<voice 08645_00005084><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>不过……
王宫的生活一定不适合我。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5084.zh-Hant:
<voice 08645_00005084><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>不過……
王宮的生活一定不適合我。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5085.en:
<voice 08760_00005085><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>My father is the person who adopted
and raised me. He is a strange man, but
he did raise me. I want to live freely, the same way he does.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5085.ja:
<voice 08760_00005085><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「私の父は　ガタラに住む　養父だけ。
　変わり者だけど　愛情込めて育ててくれました。
　私は　彼のように　自由に生きたいのです。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5085.ko:
<voice 08760_00005085><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 제 아버지는 가타라에 사는 양부뿐이에요.
　별난 사람이긴 해도 애정을 담아 키워 줬어요.
　전 그 사람처럼 자유롭게 살고 싶어요.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5085.zh-Hans:
<voice 08760_00005085><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>我的父亲，只有住在加塔拉的养父一人。
他虽然是个怪人，但一路将我拉扯大。
我想和他一样过自由的生活。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5085.zh-Hant:
<voice 08760_00005085><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>我的父親，只有住在加塔拉的養父一人。
他雖然是個怪人，但一路將我拉拔長大。
我想像他一樣過自由的生活。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5086.en: <voice 09260_00005086><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>Dura, where are you going?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5086.ja: <voice 09260_00005086><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>「ドゥラくん　どこへ行くの？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5086.ko: <voice 09260_00005086><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>: 두라, 어디 가는 거야?<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5086.zh-Hans: <voice 09260_00005086><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>杜拉，你要去哪里？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5086.zh-Hant: <voice 09260_00005086><start_lip_sync n00398 _normal m00001>杜拉，你要去哪裡？<stop_lip_animation n00398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5087.en:
<voice 09440_00005087><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>King Woolard, I apologize for
my outbursts. I will never again step
foot on Dolworm soil.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5087.ja:
<voice 09440_00005087><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ウラード国王　暴言の数々を　お許しください。
　私は　もう二度と　ドルワームの土を
　踏みません。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5087.ko:
<voice 09440_00005087><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 울라드 국왕 전하, 제 수많은 무례를
　용서해 주십시오. 전 다시는
　도르웜 땅에 발을 들이지 않겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5087.zh-Hans:
<voice 09440_00005087><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>乌拉德国王，请原谅我的无礼。
我再也不会踏上
多尔瓦姆的土地了。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5087.zh-Hant:
<voice 09440_00005087><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>烏拉德國王，請原諒我的無禮。
我再也不會踏上
多爾瓦姆的土地了。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5088.en:
<voice 09487_00005088><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>Please wait, Director Dura! There is not a single
researcher here who could replace
you as Director.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5088.ja:
<voice 09487_00005088><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「待ってください　ドゥラ院長！
　院長の代わりになるような研究者は
　どこにも　いません。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5088.ko:
<voice 09487_00005088><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 잠시만요, 두라 원장님!
　원장님을 대신할 연구자는
　어디에도 없어요.<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5088.zh-Hans:
<voice 09487_00005088><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>等等，杜拉院长！
世界上再没有
能代替院长您的研究者了。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5088.zh-Hant:
<voice 09487_00005088><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>等等，杜拉院長！
世界上再沒有
能代替院長您的研究者了。<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5089.en:
<voice 09586_00005089><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>You could've created the Sun Stone
someday without Kukulkannibal's
intervention! I truly believe that!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5089.ja:
<voice 09586_00005089><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>「院長なら　クァバルナの入れ知恵なんてなくても
　いつか　太陽の石を　創りだせたはずです！
　私は　そう信じてます！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5089.ko:
<voice 09586_00005089><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>: 원장님이라면 콰바르나의 조언이 없었어도
　언젠가 태양의 돌을 만드셨을 겁니다!
　전 그렇게 믿어요!<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5089.zh-Hans:
<voice 09586_00005089><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>院长您就算不靠夸巴尔那的小聪明，
也一定能够做出太阳之石！
我相信您！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5089.zh-Hant:
<voice 09586_00005089><start_lip_sync n00395 _normal m00001>院長您就算不靠夸亞巴爾納的小聰明，
也一定能夠做出太陽石！
我相信您！<stop_lip_animation n00395 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5091.en: <voice 09752_00005091><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>Thank you... Chiri.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5091.ja: <voice 09752_00005091><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「ありがとう……　チリ。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5091.ko: <voice 09752_00005091><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 고마워…… 치리.<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5091.zh-Hans: <voice 09752_00005091><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>谢谢你……琪莉。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5091.zh-Hant: <voice 09752_00005091><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>謝謝妳……琪莉。<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5092.en:
Dura. You shall remain as head of the Royal Research Institute. I ask that you continue to lend me
your strength for Dolworm's sake.
5092.ja:
<voice 09792_00005092><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「ドゥラよ。そなたには　これからも
　王立研究院の長であることを　命ずる。
　ドルワームのため　チカラを貸してほしい。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5092.ko:
<voice 09792_00005092><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 두라여, 그대에게는 앞으로도
　왕립 연구원의 원장으로 남을 것을 명하겠다.
　도르웜을 위해 힘을 빌려주게.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5092.zh-Hans:
<voice 09792_00005092><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>杜拉啊，我命你今后
继续担任王立研究院的院长。
为了多尔瓦姆，希望你能助我一臂之力。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5092.zh-Hant:
<voice 09792_00005092><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>杜拉啊，我命你今後
繼續擔任王立研究院的院長。
為了多爾瓦姆，希望你能助我一臂之力。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5093.ja: <voice 09872_00005093><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>「は……はいっ！<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5093.ko: <voice 09872_00005093><start_lip_sync n00396 _normal m00001>: 네…… 네!<stop_lip_animation n00396 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5094.en:
<voice 10032_00005094><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>And of course, we mustn't forget!
<pc>, the hero of Dolworm, who valiantly
buried that monster Kukulkannibal!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5094.ja:
<voice 10032_00005094><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「そして　もちろん　忘れてはならぬ。
　見事　天魔クァバルナを葬ってくれた
　ドルワームの英雄　<pc>の活躍を。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5094.ko:
<voice 10032_00005094><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그리고 물론 잊어서는 안 되겠지.
　천마 콰바르나를 무찌른
　도르웜의 영웅 <pc>의 활약을.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5094.zh-Hans:
<voice 10032_00005094><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>然后，当然不能忘了
成功埋葬天魔夸巴尔那的
多尔瓦姆英雄——<pc>精彩的表现。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5094.zh-Hant:
<voice 10032_00005094><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>然後，當然不能忘了。
成功埋葬天魔夸亞巴爾納的
多爾瓦姆的英雄──<pc>精彩的表現。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5095.en:
<voice 10052_00005095><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>As your reward, I shall give you the
Gold Key Emblem!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5095.ja:
<voice 10052_00005095><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「そなたには　ほうびとして
　金のキーエンブレムを与えよう！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5095.ko:
<voice 10052_00005095><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그대에게는 상으로
　금색 키 엠블럼을 하사하겠다!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5095.zh-Hans:
<voice 10052_00005095><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我赐予你
金之键徽作为奖赏！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5095.zh-Hant:
<voice 10052_00005095><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我賜予你
金之鑰徽作為獎賞！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<pc> received the

5096.ja:

5096.zh-Hant:

收下了

5097.en:
<voice 10298_00005097><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Also, you will now be able to use the
Dolworm station inside of the palace. I
hope it will be of use to you on your travels!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5097.ja:
<voice 10298_00005097><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「また　今後は　水晶宮の中にある
　ドルワーム鉄道駅の利用を　許可しよう。
　そなたの旅に　大いに役立てるがよい！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5097.ko:
<voice 10298_00005097><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그리고 앞으로는 수정궁 안에 있는
　도르웜 철도역을 이용해도 좋다.
　그대의 여행에 유용하게 활용하도록!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5097.zh-Hans:
<voice 10298_00005097><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>还有，今后我允许你使用
水晶宫中的多尔瓦姆车站。
希望能对你的旅程有所帮助！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5097.zh-Hant:
<voice 10298_00005097><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>還有，今後我允許你使用
水晶宮中的多爾瓦姆火車站。
讓它為你的旅行帶來幫助吧！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

32286.en:
<voice 10362_00032286><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>Thank you to all those who have
brought peace to Dolworm.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32286.ja:
<voice 10362_00032286><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「ドルワームに　平和を　もたらしてくれた
　すべての者たちに　感謝する。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32286.ko:
<voice 10362_00032286><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 도르웜에 평화를 되찾아 준
　모든 이들에게 감사를 표한다.<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32286.zh-Hans:
<voice 10362_00032286><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我要感谢为多尔瓦姆
带来和平的所有人。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
32286.zh-Hant:
<voice 10362_00032286><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>我要感謝為多爾瓦姆
帶來和平的所有人。<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>

5098.en:
<voice 10502_00005098><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>May the light of the Sun shine brightly on all of
your futures!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5098.ja:
<voice 10502_00005098><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>「そなたたちの未来に　明るい太陽の光が
　降りそそがんことを！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5098.ko:
<voice 10502_00005098><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>: 그대들의 앞날에 찬란한 태양의 빛이
　함께하기를!<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5098.zh-Hans:
<voice 10502_00005098><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>但愿明亮的太阳之光能照耀
诸位的未来！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
5098.zh-Hant:
<voice 10502_00005098><start_lip_sync n00397 _normal m00001>但願明亮的太陽之光能照耀
諸位的未來！<stop_lip_animation n00397 CLOSE_MOUTH>
